88a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro lus zhig nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na pha ma ni bu la snying brtse bas rtag tu bde zhing 'tshe ba med par 'dod do/ /rgyal po chen po de
88a2(mdo sde): bzhin du rgyal pos kyang bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / gnyen dang / grong khyer gyi skye bo dag rtag tu bsdu ba rnam bzhis bsdu bar bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po
88a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don 'thun pa'o/ /de ltar bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / gnyen dang / grong khyer gyi skye bo bsdud pa'i rgyal po
88a4(mdo sde): des don gnyis bsdus shing 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /gnyis gang zhe na/ tshe 'di'i dang / tshe phyi ma'i'o/ /rgyal po chen po de la rgyal po ni pha ma dang mtshungs so/ /bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza'
88a5(mdo sde): bshes dang / blon po dang / gnyen dang / grong khyer gyi skye bo ni rgyal po'i bu dang / bu mo dang mtshungs so/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na skyes pa 'am/ bud med gcig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba
88a6(mdo sde): dang / ri nyams dga' ba dang / nags tshal nyams dga' ba dang chu klung nyams dga' ba dang / rdzing bu nyams dga' ba dang / yul nyams dga' ba dang / khang bzang nyams dga' ba dag mthong ba las de sad na ci yang mi mthong ngo / /rgyal po chen po de bzhin du/
88a7(mdo sde): rgyal srid dang / srog dang / rgyal srid kyi bde ba dang / rgyal po'i dbang phyug gi bde ba dang / 'dod pa'i bde ba dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyi bde ba gang yin pa dag kyang rmi lam dang 'dra'o/ /'di lta ste/ glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / bud
88a8(mdo sde): med dang / khang khyim dang / chung ma dam pa dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / rtsis pa dang / blon po chen po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor dang / pha dang / ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / na tshod dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed
88b1(mdo sde): pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / gnyen dang / grong khyer gyi skye bo dang / mgron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / nor dang /
88b2(mdo sde): 'bru dang / bong ba dang / mdzod la sogs pa de dag thams cad bor nas 'gro dgos so/ /de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa yid rtan du mi rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ yun thung ba/ mi gnas pa/ g.yo ba/ 'gul ba/ 'jig pa/ skad cig pa/
88b3(mdo sde): mthar sdig pa/ zad pa dang / dengs pa'i sgo/ mthar 'jig pa'i chos can/ mthar 'gyes pa/ 'jigs pa dang bcas pa/ gnod pa dang bcas pa/ mya ngan dang / 'khrug pa mang ba/ 'drul ba/ 'brul ba/ 'chad pa/ 'bye ba/ 'jom pa/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos
88b4(mdo sde): can te/ rgyal po chen po de lta bas na mi rtag par lta zhing zad pa dang dengs pa'i sgo yin par blta bar bya ste/ 'chi bas 'jigs skrag par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po khyod chos kho nas rgyal srid gyis shig /chos ma yin pas ni mi bya'o/ /khyod chos dang
88b5(mdo sde): 'thun par gyis shig chos ma yin pa dang / 'thun par ni mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na shing rnams las me tog dag byung nas 'bras bu rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras bu dag tu gyur nas 'bras bu dag kyang
88b6(mdo sde): yal bar 'gyur ro/ /lo ma sngon por gyur pa las ser por 'gyur ro/ /ser por gyur nas yang thams cad du med par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun du rab du mchad
88b7(mdo sde): cing 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pa ji ltar yun ring yang 'bar nas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che ba grags pa/ rang gi gzi brjid kyis rnam par mdzes pa 'di gnyis
88b8(mdo sde): kyang 'jig rten 'di snang bar byas nas nub par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu sprin sdud dam/ char 'bebs pa dag 'brug bsgrags/ sgra phyung ste/ nam mkha' khebs par byas nas char gyi rgyun phab kyang char pa tha mar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
89a1(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po de bzhin du rgyal srid kyi bde ba dang / rgyal po'i dbang phyug gi bde ba dang / 'dod pa'i bde ba dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyi bde ba rnams kyang rmi lam dang 'dra'o/ /'di lta ste/ glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang /
89a2(mdo sde): dpung bu chung dang / bud med dang / khang khyim dang / chung ma dam pa dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / rtsis pa dang / blon po chen po dang / sgo ba dang / 'khor dang / pha dang / ma dang / spun dang / sring mo dang / chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dang / na tshod dang /
89a3(mdo sde): bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / blon po dang / gnyen dang / grong khyer gyi skye bo dang / mgron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel
89a4(mdo sde): dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba la sogs pa de dag thams cad bor nas 'gro dgos so/ /de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ yid brtan du mi
89a5(mdo sde): rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ yun thung ba/ mi gnas pa/ g.yo ba/ 'gul ba/ mthar 'jig pa/ skad cig pa/ mthar sdig pa/ zad pa dang dengs pa'i sgo/ mthar 'gyes pa'i chos can/ 'jig pa dang bcas pa/ gnod pa dang bcas
89a6(mdo sde): pa mya ngan dang / 'khrug pa mang ba/ 'drul ba/ 'brul ba/ 'chad pa/ 'gyes pa/ 'jig pa'i chos can te/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis mi rtag par blta zhing zad pa dang / dengs pa'i sgor blta bar bya ste/ 'chi bas 'jigs
89a7(mdo sde): skrag par bya'o/ /chos kyi rgyal srid gyis shig /chos ma yin pas ni mi bya'o/ /khyod chos dang 'thun par gyis shig /chos ma yin pa dang 'thun par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na phyogs
89a8(mdo sde): bzhi nas ri chen po sra ba/ brtan pa/ snying po dang ldan pa/ ma zhig pa/ ma gas pa/ 'phan med pa/ shin du mkhregs pa/ gcig tu stug pa/ bzhi gnam la reg cing zlog ste/ rtswa dang / shing dang / shing gel pa dang / yal
89b1(mdo sde): dang lo ma thams cad dang / sems can srog chags 'byung po thams cad phye mar 'thag cing 'ong ba de dag las ni mgyogs pas 'bros pa 'am/ stobs kyis bzlog pa 'am/ nor gyis bzlog pa 'am/ sngags dang / rdzas dang / sman rnams
89b2(mdo sde): kyis bzlog par bya bar sla ba ma yin no/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhin du 'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'ong ste/ de dag las mgyogs pas 'bros pa 'am/ stobs kyis bzlog pa 'am/ nor gyis bzlog pa 'am/
89b3(mdo sde): rdzas dang / sngags dang / sman rnams kyis bzlog par bya bar sla ba ma yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / rgud pa'o/ /rgyal po chen po rga ba ni dar la bab pa 'jom zhing 'ong pa na da ni nad med pa 'joms zhing
89b4(mdo sde): 'ong / rgud pa ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'joms zhing 'ong / 'chi ba ni srog 'jom zhing 'ong ste/ de dag las mgyogs pas 'bros pa 'am/ stobs kyis bzlog pa 'am/ nor gyis bzlog pa 'am/ rdzas dang / sngags dang /
89b5(mdo sde): sman rnams kyis zhi bar bya bar sla ba ma yin no/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ri dgas kyi tshogs kyi nang du zhugs nas ri dgas bzung ste/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bya ba byed do/ /ri
89b6(mdo sde): dgas de ni stobs po che'i kha mi bzad pas bzung bas dbang med par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhin du 'chi bdag gi gsal shing gis zug ste/ rgyags pa dang ni bral/ mgon ni med/ skyabs ni med/ dpung gnyen
89b7(mdo sde): ni med/ gshis ni 'jig /tshigs ni 'bye 'bral/ sha dang / khrag ni skams/ lus ni nad kyis gdungs/ skom ni skom/ bzhin ni 'gyur/ rkang lag ni g.yob/ las ni mi nus/ mthu ni med/ kha chu dang / snabs dang / gcin
89b8(mdo sde): dang / ngan skyugs kyis ni lus la gos/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po dag ni 'gags/ skyigs bu ni 'byung / sgra ngar ngar po ni 'thon/ sman pas ni bor/ sman dang / kha zas dang / bza' ba
90a1(mdo sde): dang / thug pa thams cad kyis ni gles la bor te/ 'gro ba gzhan dag tu 'gro bar mal gyi tha ma la ni nyal/ thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i 'khor ba'i rgyud du ni nub/ srog ni cung zad cig
90a2(mdo sde): las gshin rje'i mis ni 'jigs skrag / byur gyi dbang du ni song / dbugs rgyu ba ni chad/ kha dang sna ni gdangs/ so ni gtsigs/ sbyin pa sbyin no zhes de skad gsol ba ni 'debs/ las kyi srid pa nas yang srid pa bzhi
90a3(mdo sde): la ni 'jug / gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs ni med/ 'jig rten 'di ni 'dor/ 'jig rten pha rol du ni 'gro/ /skyas chen po ni 'degs/ mun pa chen por ni zhugs/ g.yang sa chen por ni lhung / khrod stug por ni
90a4(mdo sde): 'jug / dgon pa chen por ni 'gro/ rgya mtsho chen pos ni khyer/ las kyi rlung gis ni bdas/ sa tshugs med pa'i phyogs su ni 'gro/ g.yul ngo chen por ni 'jug /gdon chen pos ni zin/ nam mkha' la ni 'chel/ pha ma
90a5(mdo sde): dang / phu nu dang / sring mo dang / bu dang bu mos ni bskor/ dbugs ni 'chad/ nor bgo bsha' bya zhes ni zer/ kyi hud ma/ kyi hud pha/ kyi hud bu zhes ni zer/ skra ni zhig ste/ sbyin pa dang / dka' thub dang / chos 'ba' shig
90a6(mdo sde): grogs su gyur pa na/ chos ma gtogs par skyabs gzhan med/ mgon gzhan med/ gnas gzhan med/ dpung gnyen gzhan med do/ /rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na chos ni gling dang / gnas dang / mgon
90a7(mdo sde): dang / rton par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na grang bas nyen pa la me dang / mes rab tu gdungs par gyur pa la me gsod pa dang / tsha bas nyen pa la bsil ba dang / 'gron po ngal ba la ni grib ma dang / rlung
90a8(mdo sde): bsil ba dang / skom pa la chu bsil ba dang / lam du zhugs pa la bzhon pa dang / nyal ba la mal 'jam po dang / skom pa la chu grang mo dang / shin du bkres pa la zas bzang po dang / mya ngan gyis non pa la dbugs
90b1(mdo sde): 'byin pa dang / gdungs pa la sim par byed pa dang / dgon par lam stor ba la lam mtshon pa dang / nad kyis btab pa la sman pa dang / sman dang nad g.yog byed pa dang / chus khyer ba la gzings dang / 'dam du
90b2(mdo sde): bying ba la 'ju sa dang / rgal dka' ba la zam pa dang / nyam nga ba la 'bab stegs dang / mun khung na sgron ma dang / rgya mtsho chen po la gru dang / lhags pas nyen pa la rlung med pa'i gnas dang / yul gzhan du song
90b3(mdo sde): ba la lam rgyags dang / dbul po la nor dang / byed par 'dod pa la grogs dang / gcad par 'dod pa la lag cha dang / gzhig par 'dod pa la rdo rje dang / g.yul ngor zhugs pa la go cha dang / 'jigs pa la stobs
90b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i grogs dang / 'thab pa la dpung gnyen dang / dog pa la go 'byed pa dang / mu ge la nor dang ldan pa dag mgon dang / skyabs dang / gnas dang / rten du gyur pa de bzhin du rgyal po chen po 'chi bdag gi
90b5(mdo sde): gsal shing gis zug ste/ rgyags pa dang ni bral/ mgon ni med/ skyabs ni med/ dpung gnyen ni med/ gshis ni 'jig /tshigs ni 'bye 'bral/ sha dang khrag ni skam/ lus ni nad kyis gdungs/ skom
90b6(mdo sde): ni skom/ bzhin ni 'gyur/ rkang lag ni g.yob/ las ni mi nus/ mthu ni med/ kha chu dang / gcin dang / ngan skyugs kyis ni lus la gos/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi dbang po
90b7(mdo sde): dag ni 'gags/ skyigs bu ni 'byung / sgra ngar ngar po ni 'thon/ sman pas ni bor/ sman dang / kha zas dang / bza' ba dang / zas dang / thug pa thams cad kyis ni gles la bor te/ 'gro ba gzhan du 'gro bar
90b8(mdo sde): mal gyi tha ma la ni nyal/ thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i 'khor ba'i rgyud du ni nub/ srog ni cung zad cig las/ gshin rje'i mis ni 'jigs skrag /byur gyi dbang du ni song / dbugs
91a1(mdo sde): rgyu ba ni 'chad/ kha dang sna ni gdangs/ so ni gtsigs/ sbyin pa sbyin no zhes de skad gsol ba ni 'debs/ las kyis srid pa nas yang srid pa la ni 'jug /gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs ni med/
91a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di ni 'dor/ 'jig rten pha rol du ni 'gro/ skyas chen po ni 'degs/ mun pa chen por ni zhugs/ g.yang sa chen por ni lhung / khrod stug por ni 'jug /dgon pa chen por ni 'gro/ rgya mtsho chen pos ni
91a3(mdo sde): khyer/ las kyi rlung gis ni bdas/ sa tshugs med pa'i phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ chos ma gtogs par mgon gzhan med/ skyabs gzhan med/ dpung gnyen gzhan med do/ /rgyal po chen po chos ni de'i tshe de'i
91a4(mdo sde): dus na gling chen po dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / rton par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po de'i tshe 'di snyams du sems te/ kyi hud gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ phyogs gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ gang
91a5(mdo sde): du yongs su 'dzin par byed par 'gyur/ bdag gi mar ni su zhig 'gyur snyam pa las/ des sems can dmyal bar skye bar mthong bar gyur na/ 'di lta ste/ mnar med pa dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / la sogs pa'i
91a6(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba rnams su lo mang po/ lo brgya phrag mang po/ lo stong phrag mang por sdug bsngal chen po/ sdug bsngal mi zad pa/ drag po/ rtsub pa/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste/ ji srid du sems can dmyal
91a7(mdo sde): ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las yong thams cad du zad cing byang bar ma gyur pa/ de srid du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye bar mthong bar gyur na/ 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho chen
91a8(mdo sde): po'i nang du nya rlon dang / nya rlon mid la sogs pa srog chags gcig gis gcig gsod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / dbang med par skye'o/ /bdag yi dags kyi nang du skye bar mi 'gyur ram snyam na 'di lta ste/ lo mang po dang / lo brgya
91b1(mdo sde): phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang por chu'i sgra yang mi thos na mthong ba lta ci smos par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis mi rtag par blta zhing zad pa dang dengs par blta bar bya ste 'chi bas 'jigs skrag par bya'o/ /

94a1(mdo sde): @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA b+he rI ha ra ka pa ri brta nA ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rnga bo che chen po'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/

94a3(mdo sde): na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya stong mang po dag dang thabs gcig go/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za mang po dang

94b5(mdo sde): de dag ni skyes bu'i gtso bo rnams yin par rig par bya ste/ don gzhan ni ma yin no/ /dper na khyu mchog re re la yang ba lang gi tshogs yod pa bzhin du skyes bu'i gtso bo la yang slob ma lnga brgya yod de/
94b6(mdo sde): re re la yang slob ma lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do/ /de lta bas na nyan thos chen po lnga brgya tsam zhes bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'od srung chen po dang / de bzhin du kun dga' bo la sogs pa nyan thos chen po lnga brgya
94b7(mdo sde): tsam po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa dbang du gyur pa/ glang po chen po/ cang shes pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/

95b8(mdo sde): snyam 'am/ re shig phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di ltar rnga bo che chen po'i mdo yig 'bru bzhi tsam yang mi shes na/ khyod kyis
96a1(mdo sde): lta sngon ma thos pa ji ltar shes/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di de ltar rnyed dka' ba ni ngo mtshar che lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo
96a2(mdo sde): mdo 'di ni shin du rnyed par dka' ste/ kun dga' bo rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po 'di ni 'di lta ste dper na/ 'jig rten na me tog u dum ba ra rnyed pa bzhin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/

96a6(mdo sde): na 'di na dge slong dgon pa pa 'ga' zhig ri bo 'am/ 'bab chu'i 'gram 'am/ phug cig na 'dug 'dug pa las nam nangs nas grong ngam/ grong khyer zhig tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir song na des sbrul lam/
96a7(mdo sde): khyi 'am/ mi shi ba'i ro 'am/ shi ba'i ro gang yang rung ba mthong ngo / /des de mthong nas e ma'o kyi hud e ma'o kyi hud bdag kyang yun ring por 'khor bar 'khor ba na/ 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs dag nyams
96a8(mdo sde): su myong bar gyur pas da srid pa ni tha chad yin no zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas de dus gzhan zhig na snying dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' zhig gis yid bde ba dang / de nas yang mi sems pa las yang des
96b1(mdo sde): ro mthong ste/ de mthong ba na de yid byung bar gyur nas de phyir zhing grong khyer ram/ ri 'or ram/ lung pa'i mdor rgyu zhing / de de ltar rgyu ba na shi nas zhag gcig lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag gnyis lon
96b2(mdo sde): pa 'am zhes bya ba nas/ mi ro mthong na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de mthong ba kho nas 'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na
96b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sdug bsngal gyi gtam yang mi gsung / mi rtag pa'i gtam yang mi gsung / bdag med pa dang / mi gtsang ba'i gtam yang mi gsung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni
96b4(mdo sde): de dag gi chos nyid yin te/ de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag gis dgos pa'i don du ni rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
96b5(mdo sde): po rnams la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu dag re shig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams kyi don du zhing gi snyigs ma snyigs ma lnga can gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra bar 'byung ba ni dka' ba mdzad pa yin te/ de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dag khyod kyis kyang de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes rab tu 'jog par mdzad/
96b6(mdo sde): 'doms par mdzad do/ /de nas de dag lta 'dod cing phyag byed par 'dod par 'gyur te/ de dag lta 'dod cing phyag byed par
96b7(mdo sde): 'dod pa na de dag gis de rnams nye bar bstan pas de'i phyir de dag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur zhing 'ongs nas kha cig ni sa dang po thob par 'gyur/ kha cig gis ni sa bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang /
96b8(mdo sde): dgu pa dang / bcu pa'i bar dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de lta bas na rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di ni shin du rnyed par dka' ba yin te/ phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad nyan
97a1(mdo sde): par 'dod pa yang de'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs so/ /thams cad lhags pa legs so/ /lhags pa legs so/ /'di dag thams cad kyis shin du rnyed
97a2(mdo sde): par dka' ba'i mdo 'di 'dra ba thob par gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo thams cad kyi thun mong ltar mdo 'di thun mong ma yin pas lhags pa legs so zhes tshig tu ma brjod cig /
97a3(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du thams cad lhags pa legs so/ /lhags pa legs so zhes mi bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mdo 'di ni zab cing rtogs par
97a4(mdo sde): dka' ba/ yid ches shing dad par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi gsang ba yin te/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir 'ongs pa dang ma 'ongs pa thams cad la lhags pa legs so lhags pa legs so zhes tshig tu ma brjod cig /
97a5(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal g.yul 'gyed pa'i dus su rnga bo che'i sgra 'byin pa dang / khar dkrol rdebs pa de'i tshe dpung gi tshogs thams cad kyi ma lags sam
97a6(mdo sde): ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rnga bo che de nyid gang gi tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal pha rol gyi dpung dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed pa de'i dus su ji tsam na rnga bo che'i sgra byung
97a7(mdo sde): ba de'i tshe sems can mang po dag ni thos nas dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can sdar ma'i rigs can gzhan dag ni sgra de thos na de nyid kyis de dag 'chi ba 'am/ 'chi ba la thug pa'i sdug bsngal
97a8(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de'i phyir rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di ni kun dga' bo khyod kyis kyang mi shes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo chos kyi sgo'i mdo 'di la ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
97b1(mdo sde): can rnams yid ches par mi 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de lta bas na rgyu des na gang gi tshe yul ko sa la'i rgyal po g.yul 'gyed pa'i dus su rgyal po rnga bo che'i sgra 'byin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di yang
97b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi gsang ba yin te/ sangs rgyas pa'i dus su gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de na bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la bos te/ bos nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung ci dge slong
97b3(mdo sde): 'di dag dad pa can tshul dang mthun pa/ mthu dang ldan pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i don ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung sems can sbun pa lta bu ma yin pa de dag rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di
97b4(mdo sde): nyan par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po yang rang la smod par bgyid cing / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag kyang gal te de 'dra ba'i dge slong dag mchis na de dag
97b5(mdo sde): gi nang du mchis pa ma lags na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa lta ci smos te/ dge slong tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa gang lags pa de dag ni ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'khor
97b6(mdo sde): 'di thams cad ni tshul khrims bsrung ba/ tshul dang mthun pa lags te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na de dag ni tsan dan gyi snying po 'dra ba sha stag lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung 'khor 'di thams cad tshul khrims
97b7(mdo sde): bsrungs pa/ tshul dang ldan pa yin yang ci dgongs pa'i tshig la mkhas pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa'i tshig ces bgyi ba ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung dgongs pa'i tshig ces bya
97b8(mdo sde): ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba da ltar 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa/ brtan pa/ zhi ba/ ther zug pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ste/
98a1(mdo sde): mdo 'di ni dgongs pa'i tshig ces bya'o/ /'od srung mi mthun pa'i mdo dag pa 'od gsal ba 'di ni sems can dman pa rnams kyis rgyu dang gtan tshigs brgya stong gis rig par bya dgos so/ /'od srung de lta
98a2(mdo sde): bas na yang khyod kyis re shig 'khor 'di rtogs shig / de nas de'i tshe gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos sems can lhags pa 'di dag ci 'dra ba zhig yin par bltas so/ /de nas skad cig de nyid la rgya chen po ma
98a3(mdo sde): yin pa'i sems can rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rang rang la smod par byed de/ dper na
98a4(mdo sde): gyad kyi tshogs chen por rgyal po'i gyad stong thub pa zhig stan las langs te/ 'di na kho bo dang lhan cig 'gyed par 'os pa'i rgol phod pa gang yin pa de su yod ces dril bsgrags pa dang / de nas de na rgol bar ma
98a5(mdo sde): 'os pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni bdag cag gsod par 'gyur gyis 'di dang lhan cig bdag cag 'gyed par mi nus so zhes rang gis rang la smad nas cang mi smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gal te des der
98a6(mdo sde): gyad kyi zla 'ga' yang ma rnyed na de de na dpa' bo gyad zla med du gyur cing ru mtshon 'dzugs pa de bzhin du de na rgyal po ma yin pa'i sems can nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can rnams dang / theg pa la gsar du
98a7(mdo sde): z hugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa rnams kyang bdag cag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das bzhin du yang nga ni rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba ther zug pa yin no zhes ston pa 'di ni
98a8(mdo sde): rtogs par mi nus so zhes 'dor bar byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni yun ring por ston pa nyid kyi lta ba nyams par byed pa'i lta ba bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ dman pa'i sems can rnams kyis mdo dag pa
98b1(mdo sde): 'di thos nas dong ngo / /phyogs bcu de dang de dag nas lhags pa'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa gang dang gang dag yin pa de dang de dag dang lhan cig tu
98b2(mdo sde): gang dang gang dag lhags pa de dag las kyang bcu'i cha'i cha dang / brgya'i cha'i cha dang / stong gi cha'i cha dang / brgya stong gi cha'i cha dang / bye ba'i cha'i cha dang / grangs med pa'i cha'i cha gang yin pa dag 'dus par gyur to/ /
98b3(mdo sde): de la tsan dan gyi snying po 'dra ba sbun pa lta bu ma yin pa'i dge bsnyen ci 'dra ba dag 'dug par gyur ce na/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi brgyad dang ldan pa dang / gsum 'don pa dang /
98b4(mdo sde): bcu bzhi'i dang / bcwa lnga'i zhes bya ba nas zla ba phyed kyi dang / tshes brgyad kyi dang / cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed kyi bar gyi yan lag brgyad legs par blangs pa sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang /
98b5(mdo sde): don mthun pa can gal te mu ge lo bcu 'am/ bcu gnyis sam/ gzhan yang lo mang po byung yang bdag gis bza' ba 'am/ bldag pa 'am/ zas sam/ btung ba rang gi skal ba de las bdag gis pha dang ma gnyis
98b6(mdo sde): la phyed phyed/ dge slong rnams la phyed 'bul zhing bdag gis dge slong rnams la mchod yon gyi sbyin pa dor bar mi bya'o snyam pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus ngan pa la rtag par skal ba gang yin pa de tsam zhig
98b7(mdo sde): yod par 'gyur zhe na/ skyes bu dpa' bo de'i zla ba phyed kyis za ma gcig cig 'byung ste/ des za ma gcig po yang dge slong rnams la byin nas bsod nams mi zad pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /skyes bus de ltar byin
98b8(mdo sde): nas 'jig rten du/ /skyes bu dam par 'gyur bas legs 'dod mis/ /'di na bdag nyid bag med ci bya ste/ /de bas bstan la bag byed mchog yin no/ /nor ni dgra dang chom rkun sogs mang dang / /rgyal po chu
99a1(mdo sde): dang me dang mdza' bshes dang / /nye du mi mdza' bgo skal spyod mang gis/ /sdig pa spyad pa yis ni zad par 'gyur/ /rang dang rang gi longs spyod dag la yang / /spyod par byed pa skyes bu rnams kyi nor/ /
99a2(mdo sde): spyad pa nyid dang gnod pa gzhan gyis kyang / /zad par mi 'gyur shes bya dam chos phyir/ /'di zad byas mchog pha rol zad mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'dir 'phel 'jig rten pha rol du/ /zad par mi 'gyur kha dog
99a3(mdo sde): mthur bcas byed/ /mthong na thams cad dga' zhing rnyed pa dang / /mdog dang grags pa rab tu gsal bar 'gyur/ /de yi phyugs rnams zad par mi 'gyur zhing / /de yi bran pho bran mo las byed dang / /
99a4(mdo sde): las kyi mtha' rnams nyams par mi 'gyur te/ /de la thab mo rtsod dang 'gyed med cing / /de ni nam yang gnod sems med mchog thob/ /sbyin la dga' ba'i skye bo 'jig rten du/ /de la sogs pa'i
99a5(mdo sde): yon tan 'thob 'gyur bas/ /de lta bas na rtag tu chos 'dod pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig phrad par 'gyur/ /lus dang srog la mi blta lhug par gtong / /mi yi mi mchog de ni lag rkyong yin/ /
99a6(mdo sde): sems can kun la rjes su snying brtse bas/ /bu bzhin mthong na sdug cing rig par ldan/ /bsam gtan bag yod thos pas dpag tu med/ /khyim na gnas pa'i shes rab can gyis ni/ /rtag tu de ltar
99a7(mdo sde): bya dgos de dag gi/ dpe ni de 'dra mang du yod pa yin/ /yang de'i tshe na dge bsnyen ma ci 'dra ba dag cig 'dug ce na/ ji tsam khwa ma langs pa de tsam nas rang gis phyags ma blangs te/ rang gi nyen kor 'phyag cing ba'i lci
99a8(mdo sde): ba'i byug pas sa gzhi byugs pas/ sa rgyan gyis mdzes par byed pa'i legs par bya ba byed pa yin/ des der bsod snyoms pa rab tu mang po 'ongs par shes na rang gi lag gis bza' ba dang / btung ba gya
99b1(mdo sde): nom pa legs par rgyun du stobs par byed cing de dag dang bdag grong rdal lam/ grong khyer ram/ grong dag tu yang phrad cing 'grogs par gyur cig /bdag nam yang yul mtha' 'khob tu skye ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
99b2(mdo sde): dang skol bar dus ston bzhi byed par ma gyur cig / bdag sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims spyad pa dang / nyan pa dang / bdag chos kyi gtam la rtag tu spyod par gyur cig ces de lta bu'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i sring mo
99b3(mdo sde): dge bsnyen ma yid rnam par dag pa ste/ de lta bu ni dge bsnyen ma'i yon tan dag yin no/ /de la dge slong dang dge slong ma ci 'dra ba dag cig ce na/ dul ba/ zhi ba/ bag tsha ba med pa/ zag pa zad pa/ tha ma'i
99b4(mdo sde): lus 'dzin pa/ tsan dan gyi snying po 'dra ba'i 'khor dag go/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci 'dra ba dag cig ce na/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dod pa/ thams cad kyang de bzhin
99b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i snying po'i mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i phan pa ston pa/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rtag pa nyid 'dod pa/ thams cad kyang dgongs pa'i tshig la byang ba/ thams cad
99b6(mdo sde): kyang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde ston pa/ sran thub pa/ thams cad kyang tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams tshar gcod cing phan 'dogs par zhugs pa des pa rnams la mchog tu gus pa/ theg pa chen po la dad pa chen po thob pa/
99b7(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la ya mtshan du mi 'dzin pa/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde rgya chen po mchog bor nas mdo sde gzhan mi sgrogs pa'i shes rab can/ gang du sangs rgyas rtag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
99b8(mdo sde): snying po yod do zhes bstan pa gzhan yang sgrogs shing mi spong ba/ brtan pa/ 'jig tshogs la lta bas stong pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus byas thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa ther zug mchog gi gzhi de 'dod pa de
100a1(mdo sde): lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan la brten pa dag ste/ yon tan lhag ma ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /'od srung de lta bas na khyod kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du yang 'khor sol cig /de nas gnas
100a2(mdo sde): brtan 'od srung chen pos lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang bltas shing brtags te bsal na sbun pa lta bu'i skyes bu lhag ma'i 'khor dag yod par 'gyur ro/ /yang lan gsum gyi bar du bsal bas bsal ba na
100a3(mdo sde): skyes bu sbun pa lta bu ma yin pa sha stag tu gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung da 'khor 'di dag dag pa snying por gyur pa yin mod/ yang
100a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung 'khor 'dir legs par sbyangs pa legs so legs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'khor yongs su sbyangs pa lags/ ston ka'i zla ba nya
100a5(mdo sde): ba la rnam par dag pa bzhin no/ /'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ rtsis mkhan nam/ rtsis mkhan gyi slob mas/ sngon gyi sdom pas bsdams pa la 'god pa'i chas phrin lhag ma gang yin pa de 'dug pa ji lta ba de
100a6(mdo sde): bzhin du 'khor lhags pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad ces bya ba nas grangs med pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya bar snga ma bzhin no/ /'od srung de dag las bye ba brgya stong gi cha'i cha gang dag yin pa ni mi mchog bag
100a7(mdo sde): tsha ba med pa'i 'khor 'dug pa 'di dag yin gyis 'od srung da yang khyod kyis 'khor rnams la grogs po dag ci khyed cag rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo chen po yangs pa theg pa gcig pa 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po dad par dka' ba/
100a8(mdo sde): yid ches par dka' ba 'di mnyan par nus sam zhes dris shig /'od srung de bzhin du khyod kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du yang 'khor rnams la dris shig /
100b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig du gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
100b2(mdo sde): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas langs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas 'khor mang po de la smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo nyan pa'i 'os yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa
100b3(mdo sde): gcig pa 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa de khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos lan gnyis lan gsum du
100b4(mdo sde): yang skul ba bskul ba dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung bdag cag dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i ched du mchis lags pas nyan par 'tshal gyis/ btsun pa 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la
100b5(mdo sde): thugs brtse bas nye bar bzung ste/ mdo chen po de legs par bsgrags pa mdzad du gsol/ 'od srung chen pos smras pa/ ji ltar yid ches par 'gyur/ de dag gis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung dper na skyes bu btsas
100b6(mdo sde): nas lo nyi shu lon pa zhig la bu lo brgya lon pa dag yod do zhes smras pa la gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de kho na bzhin du gsung na/ bdag cag gis kyang de bzhin du yid ches par bgyi lags na btsun pa 'od srung
100b7(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos mnyan pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci gsung ba de bzhin du mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni kun nas spyan mnga' ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas
100b8(mdo sde): kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa yin no/ /btsun pa 'od srung gzhan yang bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to/ /smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed cag ni rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po mnyan pa dang / bklag pa
101a1(mdo sde): dang / gzung ba dang / bstan pa'i 'os yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung 'di ni ji ltar skyes bu btsas nas lo nyi shu lon pa'i bu lo brgya lon pa dag ltar rnga bo che
101a2(mdo sde): chen po'i mdo 'di yang de dang 'dra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das bzhin du da dung du gnas so zhes bya ba dang / bdag yod pa ma yin zhing bdag gi yod pa ma yin pa dag
101a3(mdo sde): la yang bdag ces bya bas so/ /de dag gis gsol pa/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen pas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi lags so/ /'od srung gis gsol pa/
101a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas da ni rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnga bo che brdung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dung bud du
101a5(mdo sde): gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung legs so legs so/ /'od srung da ni khyod rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po 'di nyon cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mnyan par bgyi lags so/ /
101a6(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi spyod yul du ma gyur kyang de bzhin gshegs pas bdag rnga bo che chen po'i slad du bdag la gus par mdzad lags pas so/ /yang gsol pa/ ji ltar lags
101a7(mdo sde): she na bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la 'di skad ces 'od srung khyod nga dang lhan cig 'dug gis tshur shog ces gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni don de'i slad du bgyi ba gzo bar bgyis pa tshor bar 'tshal lo/ /
101a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung legs so legs so/ /ngas kyang don 'di'i phyir gsungs so/ /'od srung dper na rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis glang po che dang / rta dang / dmag mi rnams kha zas dang /
101b1(mdo sde): bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa la sogs pas gsor 'jug go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gi tshe bdag rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / dung gi sgra shin du chen po 'byin pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
101b2(mdo sde): ba dan dag bsgreng ba dang / gang gi tshe pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs chen po nye bar gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gis gsor bcug pa'i phan yon rjes su dran nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed
101b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhing de'i tshe sems can rnams la yang phan pa byed par 'gyur/ bdag gi bka' la yang phan pa byed par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de dag kyang de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /'od srung de bzhin du nga yongs su
101b4(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das na yang khyod kyis rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di 'byin par 'gyur ro zhes ngas khyod la stan gyi phyed bstan pa yin gyis nges pa kho nar de bzhin du gyis shig / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
101b5(mdo sde): bdag ni khyod kyi thugs las skyes pa'i sras kyi thu bor gzhag pa'i rigs lags so/ /'od srung dper na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rang gi bu rnams la 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag gi
101b6(mdo sde): rigs 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan bcos sna tshogs dang / bzo'i gnas rnams la sbyong bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od srung khyod kyang nga 'das nas mdo 'di 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung dper na ko
101b7(mdo sde): sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po mang pos bsdos nas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed pa de dang de'i dus kyi dmag mi glang po che ba dang / rta pa dang / dpung bu chung gang dag yin pa las go cha
101b8(mdo sde): bzang po bgos shing rnga bo che chen po dang / dung gi sgra thos na mi dngang mi skrag cing bred par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag la ni rgyal pos bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / zas dang / skom dang / gos dang /
102a1(mdo sde): rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / chas dag sbyin par byed do/ /de las gzhan pa g.yul ngor zhugs nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i dmag mi gang yin pa de dag la ni gser dang / nor bu dang /
102a2(mdo sde): mu tig la sogs pa dang / grong rdal dang / yul rnams sbyin par byed do/ /de na skyes bu dpa' bo sde dang bcas par phyir mi ldog pa/ glang po che ba dang / rta pa dang / shing rta pa dang ldan pas dgra'i
102a3(mdo sde): dpung pham par byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal po rang gis rig par byas nas rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba'i cod pan bcing bar byed do/ /'od srung de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
102a4(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la bslab pa legs par ji ltar bcas pa la legs par bslabs pa gang yin pa de dag dang / so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa dang / 'dul ba'i cho ga dang / spyod yul
102a5(mdo sde): la gnas pa de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pas lha dang mi'i bde ba sbyin par mdzad do/ /de las gzhan pas phung po'i bdud dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud dang / lha'i bu'i bdud pham
102a6(mdo sde): par byed pa gang yin pa de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i rnam par grol ba'i cod pan 'ching bar mdzad do/ /de las gzhan pa'i rgya chen po la lhag par mos pa de bzhin
102a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i snying po'i che ba'i bdag nyid rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug pa 'dod pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
102a8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes theg pa chen po dbang bskur ba'i cod pan 'ching bar mdzad do/ /'od srung de bzhin du khyod kyang de ring theg pa chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i cod pan bcings te/ sangs
102b1(mdo sde): rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po'i spyan snga nas rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na 'od srung khyod kyis kyang da ni nga 'das nas mdo 'di 'byung ba'i rigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das re shig bdag
102b2(mdo sde): gis rigs par lta rngo mi thog kyang bcom ldan 'das re shig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam bzhugs kyang bdag gis phyung nas bstan par bgyi lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung
102b3(mdo sde): legs so/ /da ni de bzhin gshegs pas rnga bo che chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo chen po bshad pa brtsam mo/ /de nas nam mkha' las lha'i tshogs dang / 'brug gi tshogs kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'od srung
102b4(mdo sde): legs so legs so/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir da ni lha rnams dang / 'brug gi tshogs rnams kyang me tog gi char 'bebs shing bdud rtsi'i chus gang ba'i phye ma'i char gyi rgyun chen po yang 'bebs
102b5(mdo sde): so/ /'od srung khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal dang thugs las skyes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi thu bor 'os so/ /de nas lha'i tshogs dang / 'brug gi tshogs kyis skad mthun par tshigs su bcad pa
102b6(mdo sde): 'di smras so/ /mnyan yod grong khyer dag tu rnga chen dang / /shin du rnga chen dung rnams sgrogs pa na/ /mgon po chos kyi rje yis rgyal byed kyi/ /tshal du chos kyi rnga chen sgrogs par mdzad/ /'od srung khyod kyis chos rnga
102b7(mdo sde): brdung bar gyis/ /chos kyi rgyal po dag gis gsungs pa'i mdo/ /zhu ba'i dbyig gus chos rnga che brdungs na/ /lha'i lhas chos mang the tsom gcod par mdzad/ /rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po las 'od srung 'ongs pa
102b8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i le'u'o/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'od srung ngas sngar/ mdo 'di las gong
103a1(mdo sde): nas gong du dge slong yangs pa la dad pa'i yid can zhes bya ba zhig yod ces bshad pa dge slong de'i ming dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ sems can
103a2(mdo sde): gang dag gis thos pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi zug rngu rnams dbyung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung 'di lta ste dper na/ ko sa la'i rgyal
103a3(mdo sde): po gsal rgyal la 'tsho byed kyi bu sman mchog ces bya ba yod de/ de gang gi tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur la de nas rgyal pos g.yul shom
103a4(mdo sde): pa na sman pa sman mchog bkug ste/ bkug nas 'di skad ces sman pa sman gang gis sems can gang dang gang dag zug rngus zug par gyur pa'i sems can de dang de dag ji lta ji ltar zug rngu dbyung bar 'gyur ba de
103a5(mdo sde): lta bu'i sman sbyor la myur du khyer te shog shig / de nas sman pa sman mchog des sman gyi rgyal po dug sman rtol pa zhes bya ba khyer nas rgyal po chen po g.yul ngor 'jug pa'i rnga bo che la sman des byug shing
103a6(mdo sde): bdugs te brdungs so/ /byugs shing bdugs te brdungs ma thag tu sems can zug rngus zug par gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis sgra dpag tshad dam/ dpag tshad gnyis su thos nas thos pa tsam
103a7(mdo sde): gyis sems can de dang de dag thams cad kyi zug rngu rnams dbyung bar 'gyur/ zug rngu rnams bsal bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung de bzhin du dge slong yangs pa la dad pa'i yid can de'i ming thos pa'i sems
103a8(mdo sde): can gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi zug rngu rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des nga'i bstan pa la mdo 'di phyung zhing rgyas par
103b1(mdo sde): byas te/ de bas na chos dang ldan pa mngon sum du byas pa de'i mthu'o/ /'od srung ltos/ re shig rgyal po'i rnga bo che sems med pa phal pa de yang sems dang bcas pas sman gyis byugs shing bdugs
103b2(mdo sde): te brdungs ma thag tu sems can rnams la phan pa skyed par byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yangs pa la dad pa'i yid can gyi ming thos pas sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rnam pa
103b3(mdo sde): gsum 'bral bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gal te de ltar re shig byang chub sems dpa'i ming thos pas sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi zug rngu rnams
103b4(mdo sde): 'bral bar 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan brjod pa 'am/ yon tan yongs su bsgrags pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/
103b5(mdo sde): gal te de ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan tsam gyis sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi zug rngu rnams 'bral bar 'gyur na sems can la phan pa
103b6(mdo sde): ston pa zhig gis rnga bo che chen po'i mdo 'di las 'gres sam/ tshigs su bcad pa 'am/ tshig 'ga' tsam 'am/ ming tsam bstan pa 'am/ le'u ston na sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /
103b7(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi zug rngu rnams 'bral bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas dge slong dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems kyi smon lam 'grub bo zhes bshad de/
103b8(mdo sde): sngon smon lam legs par sbyang ba byas pa'i phyir ro/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos nyid yin te/ 'di lta ste/ rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen pos ma byas pa/ ma byung ba
104a1(mdo sde): ma 'gags pa'o/ /'od srung khyod kyang de lta bas na ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyi yang ming thos pa'i dge slong ngam/ /dge slong ma 'am/
104a2(mdo sde): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang yin pa de dag dang / sems can de dag thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi zug rngu rnams 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir 'od srung khyod
104a3(mdo sde): kyang mdo 'di zhus nas yun ring por 'jig rten du 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta lags na rnga bo che chen po'i mdo chen po de las phyogs 'ga' tsam zhig bdag
104a4(mdo sde): la legs par bshad du gsol/ /'od srung dus la bab kyis khyod nga la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhus shig /'od srung gis legs so zhes gsol nas zhu ba 'di zhus so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang na
104a5(mdo sde): srid yod srid pa der sdug bsngal/ /gang na srid med sdug bsngal med pa yi/ /mya ngan 'das pa de ni mchog tu bde/ /bde sdug spang phyir mya ngan 'das mchog 'gyur/ /srid pa yod na bde dang sdug
104a6(mdo sde): bsngal te/ /srid pa med na bde dang sdug bsngal med/ /de'i phyir mya ngan 'das thob 'dod pa yis/ /rigs kyi bu yis srid 'dod yongs su gcad ces bka' stsal pa 'di'i don ci lags/ 'dir tshigs
104a7(mdo sde): su bcad pas legs par bka' stsal pa/ sred pa thams cad mi rtag mi brtan la/ /thams cad du yang snying po med pas na/ /srid pa gang yin de ni sdug bsngal te/ /gang la srid med de na sdug bsngal
104a8(mdo sde): med/ /srid pa yod pa min na sdug bsngal med/ /'di na srid yod sdug bsngal 'gyur bas na/ /srid la mngon par dga' bar mi bya zhing / /srid pa rnams la yid brtan 'gro mi bya/ /bcom ldan srid dang srid
104b1(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / /bde dang sdug bsngal 'gyur ba yod par ston/ /de skad gsungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal to/ /'od srung de ltar tshig gi don 'di ni brtan pa'i
104b2(mdo sde): tshig gi don yin pas re shig 'od srung khyod kyis mi shes so/ /sems can ni phal cher srid pa gcod par mi byed de/ sems can rnams ni 'du byed skud pas brgyus/ /srid med mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu bde/ /
104b3(mdo sde): 'od srung gis gsol pa/ gang gis mya ngan 'das thob pa/ /mya ngan 'das pa de mi gnas/ /de la bde ba ming tsam ste/ /mis ni myong bar 'gyur ma mchis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
104b4(mdo sde): thar pa brtan pa ming tsam min/ /yod dang med dang ther zug gzhi/ /de lta bas na 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul ma yin zhing spyod yul ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
104b5(mdo sde): ji ltar gzugs kyang lags la ther zug kyang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung dper na lho phyogs kyi yul skye bo'i bcom brlag ces bya ba nas sems can gzhan 'ga' zhig
104b6(mdo sde): 'ongs par gyur la/ mi de la mi 'ga' zhig gis khyod gang nas 'dir 'ongs shes dris pa dang / de nas des smras pa/ kho bo ni lho phyogs kyi bcom brlag nas 'ongs so/ /mis yang smras pa/ de yul gyi
104b7(mdo sde): phyogs gang na yod/ de nas mi des mdzub mos lho phyogs kyi lam gyi nam mkha' bstan na/ 'od srung mi des mi de la ji ga yid ches par 'gyur ram/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ song na de mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'od srung
104b8(mdo sde): de bzhin du khyod kyis ma mthong bar dad pas yid ches par gyis shig / 'phags pa rnga bo che chen po'i le'u/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad
105a1(mdo sde): pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /ji ltar mkha' la mdzub mos ston pa ltar/ /de bzhin thar pa ming tsam gyis bstan to/ /ji ltar lho phyogs bcom brlag mi bzhin du/ /de bzhin nga nyid brten pa med nas byon/ /'od srung
105a2(mdo sde): 'di la 'ang don mthong na/ /rgyu ni dgos pa yod med de/ /mngon sum ma gyur don la ni/ /rgyu dang rkyen kyang de bzhin no/ /'od srung de lta bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu du mas thar pa'i tshig gi don nye bar
105a3(mdo sde): ston par mdzad do/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung rgyu zhes bya ba ci yin par 'dod/ gsol pa/ rgyu ni byed rgyu zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkyen ces bya ba gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/
105a4(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rkyen ces bgyi ba de ni rten lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung rigs pa'i dpe dang / rgyu dang nye bar sbyar ba dang / byed rgyu rnams kyis de ji lta bu yin pa de kho na de bzhin du gsal bar ston
105a5(mdo sde): cig / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dper na pha dang ma gnyis 'dus pa las bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la ma ni rgyu lags so/ /pha ni rkyen lags te/ de lta bas na pha dang ma gnyis ni bu'i rgyu dang rkyen lags so/ /
105a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du rgyu dang rkyen gyis chos skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni grub pa zhes bgyi'o/ /grub pa zhes bya ba ci yin/ grub pa zhes bgyi ba ni 'jig rten gyi grags pa lags so/ /'jig rten zhes bya ba ci yin/ 'od srung
105a7(mdo sde): gis gsol pa/ sems can dang ldan pas btags pa gang lags pa'o/ /sems can zhes bya ba ci yin/ sems can zhes bgyi ba ni chos kyi brdar btags pa lags so/ /chos zhes bya ba ci yin/ gsol pa/ chos ma
105a8(mdo sde): lags pa'i chos dang / chos kyi chos so/ /chos de dag kyang rnam pa gnyis su bstan to/ /rnam pa gnyis gang lags she na/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma lags pa ste/
105b1(mdo sde): de las mu gsum pa ni ma mchis pa lags so/ /de la chos zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ gsol pa/ chos zhes bgyi ba ni gzugs ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos ma yin pa ji lta bu yin/
105b2(mdo sde): chos ma lags shes bgyi ba de yang gzugs ma mchis pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gal te chos dang chos ma yin pa gzugs med cing mtshan ma med pa yin na de la chos ni gang / chos ma yin
105b3(mdo sde): pa ni gang / gsol pa/ chos zhes bgyi ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /chos ma lags pa zhes bgyi ba ni sred pa zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gal te de ltar
105b4(mdo sde): chos dang chos ma yin pa gzugs med cing mtshan nyid med pa yin na sangs rgyas rnams kyis ji ltar ci zhig mtshan ma gang gis 'di ni chos yin no zhes rnam par mkhyen par 'gyur/ gsol pa sems
105b5(mdo sde): can rnams 'khor bar skyes nas dge ba'i bsod nams dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs la bsten pa na de'i tshul 'di dang / de de ltar chos mngon du yang dag par spyad pas dge ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad kun
105b6(mdo sde): du skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ de ltar chos mngon du yang dag par spyod pa gang lags pa de lta bu'i sems can de dag ni chos lags so/ /sems can rnams 'khor bar skyes nas bsod nams ma lags pa/ sdig
105b7(mdo sde): pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs kun du spyod cing chos ma lags pa kun spyod pa/ de kho na la sdig pa mi dge ba'i mtshan nyid de dag thams cad skye bar 'gyur te/ de ltar chos ma lags pa kun du
105b8(mdo sde): spyod pa gang lags pa de lta bu'i sems can de ni chos ma lags pa lags so/ /de la sems can zhes bgyi ba ni nang gi sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang /
106a1(mdo sde): khams bzhis yang dag par bsdus shing btags pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye mched drug dang / dbang po lnga dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / sems dang / yid
106a2(mdo sde): kyi rnam par shes pa ste/ de ltar srid pa'i yan lag bcu gsum gyi bar ni chos thams cad ces bgyi ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de dag kho na la sems can gyi chos zhes bya na/ de la sems can zhes bya
106a3(mdo sde): ba'i chos gang yin zhe na/ gsol pa/ de la sems can zhes bgyi bar btags pa'i chos 'ga' yang ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dper na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi rnga bo che
106a4(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de'i rnga bo che zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung rnga bo che gang yin pa de nyid rnga bo che yin par shes par bya ste/ rnga bo che zhes bya ba ni lpags pa dang / dbyig gu dang / shing leb dang /
106a5(mdo sde): chos 'di gsum tshogs pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag la rnga bo che zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ de la brdung ba'i mi la rnga bo che zhes bgyi ba lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ mi med par yang rnga bo che rlung gis bskyod pa na sgra 'byung ngo / /gsol pa/
106a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ rnga bo che zhes bgyi ba chos sam/ 'on te chos ma lags pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rnga bo che zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ de ci zhes bgyi/
106a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ chos gang zhig chos gang dang yang lhan cig ldan pa ma yin zhing / chos ma yin pa dang yang ma yin pa 'di lung du ma bstan pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ gal te lung du ma bstan pa'i chos shig mchis na des na 'jig
106a8(mdo sde): rten na chos gsum mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bka' stsal pa/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni ji ltar skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin pa ltar ma ning zhes bya'o/ /dper na ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod kyis
106b1(mdo sde): 'di ni pha dang ma 'dus pa'i bu yin no zhes smras pa gal te pha dang ma 'bras bu med par gyur na kha cig 'di skad ces ma dang pha ni rgyu dang rkyen ma yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /yang bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi sa bon gyi dngos po med pa gang yin pa
106b2(mdo sde): de dag ni 'bras bu med pas de dag ni rtag tu ma ning zhes bya bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'od srung dper na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gang gi tshe pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang lhan cig lhag par nyam nga bar gyur pa na brgya la ji zhig
106b3(mdo sde): ltar gyur pa de'i tshe/ de'i drung du dbang thang gis 'tsho ba dag de dang lhan cig rjes su mi 'brang zhing sgrol bar mi byed pa gang yin pa de dag bud med dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /gsol pa/ ci'i slad du/ bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po rnams ni zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi
106b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi rang bzhin brtags nas gsor 'jug go/ /rgyu des na sa bon med pa'i sems can de dag pha dang mar mi 'gyur bas sems can de dag rtag par ma ning yin par blta bar bya'o/ /yang bka' stsal pa/ dge ba'i chos dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang /
106b5(mdo sde): lung du ma bstan pa'i chos te/ dge ba'i chos ni tshor ba bde ba yin no/ /mi dge ba'i chos ni tshor ba sdug bsngal ba yin no/ /lung du ma bstan pa'i chos ni tshor ba bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa yin te sems can rnams
106b6(mdo sde): ni chos 'di gsum gyis rtag tu reg par 'gyur ro/ /de la tshor ba bde ba zhes bya ba ni lha dang mi rnams kyi 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yin no/ /tshor ba sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / yi
106b7(mdo sde): dgas kyi 'jig rten gyi yin no/ /tshor ba bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa ni ji ltar 'brum bu phra mo dang / shu ba yin te de la 'brum bu phra mo dang / shu bas nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa yin
106b8(mdo sde): nam/ 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ ci'i phyir/ gsol pa/ bde ba las sdug bsngal 'byung zhing sdug bsngal las kyang sdug bsngal 'byung bas 'di gnyis ka lung du ma bstan pa lags
107a1(mdo sde): so/ /bka' stsal pa/ ci kha zas las nad byung ngam/ gsol pa/ gang gi tshe 'tshal ba de'i tshe bde ba zhes bgyi ba lags so/ /gang gi tshe nad du gyur pa de'i tshe sdug bsngal zhes bgyi ba lags te/ de la shu ba gang lags pa de ni
107a2(mdo sde): lung du ma bstan pa zhes bgyi lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gal te de lta bas na bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba yang lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya la pha dang ma dang bu yang lung du ma bstan par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa de ni ma lags so/ /bka' stsal
107a3(mdo sde): pa/ 'o na ji lta bu yin/ gsol pa/ ji ltar 'du shes med 'du shes med min la sogs pa'i lha ther zug gi gzhi zhes mi bgyi ba lta bu'i chos dge ba 'di yang de dang 'dra lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes la
107a4(mdo sde): sems can no zhes smras pa/ des na 'du shes med 'du shes med min la sogs pa'i lha dag sems can ma yin par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de rnams la yang 'du byed kyi ngo bo mchis lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/
107a5(mdo sde): 'o na tshor ba dang 'du shes ma gtogs pa'i chos 'di dag la sems can zhe 'am/ 'on te kha cig de lta bu'i sems can dag yod do zhes zer na/ des na 'di ltar sems can ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa dag sems can du 'gyur ro/ /
107a6(mdo sde): ci'i slad du/ sems can gzugs can yin nam 'on te gzugs can ma yin/ gsol pa/ gzugs can yang ma lags/ gzugs can ma lags pa yang ma lags mod kyi chos de dag dang ldan pa ni sems can zhes bgyi lags
107a7(mdo sde): so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gal te de ltar na sems can ma yin pa'i chos dang ldan pa de dag sems can du skye bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs med pa zhes bya'o/ /ji ste de ltar gyur na 'jig rten du chos rnam pa gnyis po gzugs can
107a8(mdo sde): ma yin pa de 'byung bar 'gyur te/ chos gzugs can dang / chos ma yin pa gzugs can no/ /thar pa chos dang lhan cig gam/ 'on te chos ma lags pa dang lhan cig lags/ gzugs ma mchis pa'i lha la yang thar
107b1(mdo sde): pa mchis pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ de ni ma yin te/ chos 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa yod pas/ de'i phyir gzugs med pa'i lha de dag kyang 'dus byas kyi nang du bgrang bar 'gyur gyi thar pa ni 'dus ma byas yin no/ /gsol
107b2(mdo sde): pa/ des na gzugs ma mchis pa'i lha rnams kyang gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/ /'od srung ji ltar 'dus byas thams cad gzugs can yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas gzugs can ma yin par gsal bar smros
107b3(mdo sde): shig / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ma mchis pa'i lha rnams gzugs dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba'i gzugs sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'gyur ba lags grang / bdag cag gi yul du ni mi 'gyur lags
107b4(mdo sde): so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung legs so legs so/ /de bzhin du thar par gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang nga'i yul yin te/ de rnams kyang gzugs can yin la thar pa de yang
107b5(mdo sde): gzugs can yin no/ /yang bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung ci khyod kyis gzugs med pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i gnas dang byed pa yang dag par shes sam/ yang bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung
107b6(mdo sde): ci khyod kyis gzugs can gyi lha rnams gzugs med pa zhes bya ba'i nang du bgrang ngam/ ci na bdag cag gi yul ma lags so zhes zer/ yang bka' stsal pa/ thar pa brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas
107b7(mdo sde): blo shin du rnam par dag pa rnams kyang de kho na bzhin du gzugs zhes bya bar gsal bar yang dag par ltos shig / 'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar na thar pa thob
107b8(mdo sde): pa gnas pa'i phyir yang bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ sems can nad pa zhig sman bcud kyis len 'thungs nas nad dang bral bar gyur na ci yang nad bu can du 'gyur
108a1(mdo sde): ram/ gal te 'ga' zhig mchis na nges par 'gyur lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gal te las med kyang 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung bde
108a2(mdo sde): ba dang sdug bsngal spangs pa de nyid thar pa yin te/ nad ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal lta bu yin la mi lta bur ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob par blta'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bde ba dang sdug
108a3(mdo sde): bsngal spangs pa zhes bgyi ba las ma mchis pas nad zad pa thob pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ thar pa thob pa ni 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi las gang yin pa de dang bral zhing zad pa bzhin no/ /bcom
108a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de ci'i slad du yang 'gum par mi 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' nam mkha' lta bu'o zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chen po nam mkha' lta bu'o zhes pa/ ci nam mkha' dpe med pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bu yin nam/
108a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du thar pa ni dpe med pa yin no/ /ji ltar gzugs med pa'i lha rnams kyi gzugs yod kyang dga' ba de dang de lta bus gnas pa mi shes pa de bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thar pa yang btags
108a6(mdo sde): pa med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' yang mi rtag pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ dper na ji lta bu ji ltar rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi khang bzangs ngang pa ltar dkar ba brtsigs pa de'i tshe nam mkha'
108a7(mdo sde): nyams pa de ni nam mkha' zhig pa zhes bgyi lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ chos gzugs med pa ji ltar 'jig /gzugs med pa'i lha rnams kyang ji ltar 'jig lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gzugs med pa'i lha gang dag
108a8(mdo sde): yin pa de dag sems can zhes bgyi bar bgrang ngam ci/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' sems ma mchis pa sems dang bcas pa ji ltar 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' la rten pa'i khang pa 'am/ ri gang dang gang dag
108b1(mdo sde): yin pa zhig kyang nam mkha' mi 'jig pa ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa yang de dang 'dra'o/ /rten nam mkha' mi 'jig pa ltar byed pa po dang / tshor ba po yang de dang 'dra lags sam/
108b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus na/ sems can rnams kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa'i chos yod pa gang yin pa 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad dang / chos
108b3(mdo sde): thams cad ma mchis pa ji lta bu lags/ rnga bo che'i tshogs pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ /yang gsol pa/ ji ltar gdugs kyi 'od dang / nor bu'i 'od gnyis po de las 'jig rten na zhugs zhes bgyi ba de bzhin du mi rnams las
108b4(mdo sde): bdag gir bya ba zhes bgyi na bcom ldan 'das chos gcig po 'di gang gi rnam par smin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod kyis mi shes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so/ /bka'
108b5(mdo sde): stsal pa/ zla ba byung ba smros shig /bcom ldan 'das zla ba ni sems can rnams kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i chos ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ gal te de lta na dpe brjod dgos te/ ci ste nor bu dang / zla ba
108b6(mdo sde): dang / nyi ma dang / me sems can gyis ma byas kyi/ tshogs pas byas pa yin na/ steng gi lha rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i nyi ma dang / zla ba de dag ci sems can ma yin nam/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
108b7(mdo sde): kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sems can zhes bgyi bas de dag kyang sems can gyi grangs su bgrang ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni sems can ma yin no/ /
108b8(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du lags/ sems can grong ba'i bshes gnyen can phal pa ma yin pa yang sems can rnams dang mnyam par mi rtsi bas/ sangs rgyas ni rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i chos kyi rgyu 'thun pa ste/
109a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin la/ sems can yang rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i chos kyi rgyu 'thun pa yin no/ /'od srung gang gi tshe sems can thams cad zad par gyur pa de'i
109a2(mdo sde): tshe/ gal te me byung nas 'jig pa 'am/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba de smros shig /bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal lags so/ /ngas sngar khyod kyi mi shes so zhes gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das skye ba dang / rga ba dang /
109a3(mdo sde): na ba dang / 'chi ba gang nas mchis/ gang du mchi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rnga bo che'i sgra gang nas 'ongs/ gang du 'gro/ bcom ldan 'das tshogs pa las lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ ji lta bu yin/ ji ltar
109a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad ma bgyis pa/ byed pa po ma mchis pa/ byed pa po dang bral ba ltar rnga bo che'i sgra yang de dang 'dra lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ de ni ma yin te/ rnga bo che la ni byed pa po yod dam/ bcom ldan 'das ma
109a5(mdo sde): mchis lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa ther zug gi gzhi thob pa'i sems can de dag su zhig byed de byed pa po med do/ /sems can rnams rang gi bdag nyid kyis bdag byed de/ ji
109a6(mdo sde): lta zhe na/ sems can gyis gal te bsod nams byed na ni sangs rgyas yin la/ 'on te mi byed na ni sems can yin no/ /sems can thog ma sus bgyis lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi
109a7(mdo sde): lha la sogs pa gzugs med pa'i lha rnams kyang sus byas/ gson por yang ji ltar gnas/ bcom ldan 'das las kyis ni gnas lags na de dag gi las dang de bzhin du khyim bdag tshong dpon dang tshul
109a8(mdo sde): yang 'tshal bar ni rngo mi thog lags so/ /shin tu gnas pa nyid du su zhig byed/ gsol pa/ las kyis bgyid do/ /las las ni chos du ma skye ste/ dge ba las kyang chos du ma skye'o/ /de la dge ba las skye
109b1(mdo sde): ba'i chos ni gang dag lags mi dge bas skye ba ni gang dag lags/ bka' stsal pa/ las las ni srid pa skye'o/ /dge ba'i las las ni thar pa skye'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma skyes pa'i gnas dge ba
109b2(mdo sde): la ji ltar skye bar 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid las so/ /gal te sangs rgyas dge ba las skye ba lags na/ mi skye ba'i gnas ji ltar 'thob lags/ bka' stsal pa/ legs par
109b3(mdo sde): skye ba'i las kyis so/ /de sus bslabs lags/ bka' stsal pa/ thog ma med pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslabs so/ /thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus thams cad su zhig gis mngon par sprul cing bslabs
109b4(mdo sde): lags/ bka' stsal pa/ thog ma med pa'i ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes pa 'am bsam par mi nus so/ /gal te 'jig rten du shA ri'i bu lta bur mang du thos par gyur pa'i mi 'ga' zhig
109b5(mdo sde): byung ste/ des 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i dang po gang yin zhes dus ring po mtha' yas par rtag tu bsams kyang shes pa 'am bsam par mi nus kyi de'i bar skabs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
109b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba kho nar zad do/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu chen po lta bu dag phyi ma'i mtha' yas par rtag tu rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis song yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas
109b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang / zhing blta ba rtogs par mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu thob pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin no/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin no/ /
109b8(mdo sde): yang bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can 'byung ba yang de kho na bzhin du shes par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byed pa po dang / tshor ba po yang ma mchis pa ma lags sam/
110a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung byed pa po dang / tshor ba po ni rgyu yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten 'di la bas pa mchis sam/ 'on te ma mchis/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten la ni nam yang
110a2(mdo sde): ji ltar yang lan 'ga' yang zad pa med do/ /yang bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung dper na rgya mtsho zad mi shes pa la mi 'ga'
110a3(mdo sde): zhig gis skra'i rtse mos bcus na/ ba lang gi rmig rjes tsam du 'gyur ram mi 'gyur/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung 'das pa'i dus bskal pa
110a4(mdo sde): grangs med pa'i ches grangs med pa/ bskal pa yangs shing ches yangs pa zhig byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra can zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des
110a5(mdo sde): grong khyer chen po 'di nyid du chos bshad pa de'i tshe li tsa bi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba 'di chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po de bzhin
110a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa de'i drung du song nas/ des 'byor pa chen po dang / klu'i bskor ba byas nas btsun mo dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la mchod de tshig 'di dag gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag nam zhig na
110a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur lags/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /
110a8(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po dang tshangs pa la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid yod pa ma yin pas de las gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dge bsnyen du gyur pa gang dang gang yin pa de dang de dag ni dbang po dang
110b1(mdo sde): tshangs par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po nyid dang tshangs pa nyid kyi rgyal po mang po du ma byas nas de'i 'og tu chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ khyod kyis dbang po nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid gang gA'i
110b2(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma dang mnyam par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu khyod kyis 'khor los sgyur ba 'di nyid thob pa yin no/ /de nas yang rgyal po des yang bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das dbang po nyid dang /
110b3(mdo sde): tshangs pa nyid ji lta bu lags/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ dbang po dang tshangs pa la sogs pa ji snyed yod pa khyod dang 'dra bar cod pan thogs pa de dag thams cad ni khyod kyi drung na jis kyang
110b4(mdo sde): mdzes pa ma yin te/ dper na sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mdun na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lam mer ma yin/ thal ler ma yin/ lhag ger ma yin pa bzhin no/ /de bzhin
110b5(mdo sde): du rgyal po chen po khyod dang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog dang 'dra bar khong du chud par bya na/ 'od srung khyod 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dpe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / brgya byin kau shi ka las blang bar
110b6(mdo sde): sems pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'od srung de nas gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des yang bcom ldan 'das de la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ bdag 'jig rten du sangs rgyas
110b7(mdo sde): su 'gyur lags sam/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod dus ring mo'i yang shin du dus ring mo zhig na sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po
110b8(mdo sde): gal te khyod rang gi bsod nams spangs shing gcig tu bor nas brtsams te/ phal ba'i 'du shes su byas nas de'i tshe skra'i rtse mos rgya mtsho chen po 'di bcus te/ ba lang gi rmig rjes tsam du byed na de'i tshe 'jig rten du
111a1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ der rgyal po sa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad
111a2(mdo sde): des rgyal po chen po khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na shAkya'i skyes mchog gau ta mA zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe 'jig rten du sreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis deng nas
111a3(mdo sde): bzung ste/ rgya mtsho chen po ba lang gi rmig rjes tsam du byed na/ de'i tshe lo brgya phrag mang po dang / bar gyi bskal pa mang po dang / bskal pa stong phrag mang po 'das nas/ sreg pa'i bskal pa mang po dang / sangs rgyas rnams
111a4(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas de dag la mnyes par byed/ mchod par byed pas rgya mtsho chen po ba lang gi rmig rjes tsam du byed par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des rtag tu skra'i rtse mos rgya mtsho
111a5(mdo sde): chen po de/ ji ltar zad par byed ce na/ de ltar la lar brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi shin du bde ba yang dang yang du 'dod na rgya mtsho chen po de rim pa 'dis zad par byed do/ /
111a6(mdo sde): de nas sreg pa'i bskal pa de dag kyang tshar phyin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu de'i tshe brgya lam na res 'ga' zhig sangs rgyas mkhan po mar me mdzad ces bya
111a7(mdo sde): ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad des rgyal po sa'i dbang phyug de la rgyal po chen po khyod sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung ston to/ /de'i tshe rgyal po chen po khyod rgyal po de'i bu gzhon nu thu bor gyur nas
111a8(mdo sde): de dang lhan cig sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des ched du brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyi bus rgya mtsho chen po de ltar zad par byas nas da ltar khyod kyi bur gyur
111b1(mdo sde): pas/ khyod kyi bu ni rgyal po phal pa'i rang bzhin ma yin/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha'i rgyal po brgya byin nam/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa 'khor los sgyur ba zhig yin no/ /khyod kyi bu ni brtson
111b2(mdo sde): 'grus chen por 'gyur te/ sa'i dbang phyug de ltar byang chub ni rnyed dka'o zhes dpe ched du brjod pa 'di blangs pa yin no/ /sa'i dbang phyug khyod kyi bu 'di bud med stong phrag drug cu nor bu dang / rna cha gdub 'khor gyi phreng ba can
111b3(mdo sde): dang / lha'i bu mo sgeg mo lta bu'i bud med dag mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin bor nas/ e ma'o 'dod pa rnams ni mi rtag go zhes grags pas lha'i bu mo sgeg mo lta bu'i bud med de dag ni mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du rtogs
111b4(mdo sde): so/ /e ma'o 'dod pa rnams ni ther zug ma yin pa/ mi brtan pa/ mi rtag go zhes grags pas bdag ni khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba sla'o zhes de ltar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
111b5(mdo sde): des gzhon nu de la gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mgon po shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'byung ba de'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po khyod li tsa bi gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/
111b6(mdo sde): de nas 'jig rten gyi khams der mgon po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bstan pa nub pa'i dus kyi tshe/ lo brgyad bcu lon pa na dge slong blo 'chang shes bya bar gyur nas rang gi srog la yang mi lta bar byas te mdo 'di
111b7(mdo sde): 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lo brgya lon pa'i 'og tu shi nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po mang du 'byin par 'gyur zhing sa brgyad pa la gnas te/ lus gcig
111b8(mdo sde): ni bde ba can na 'dug / lus gcig ni sprul te dga' ldan du bzhag nas/ mgon po mi pham pa la mdo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /de nas rgyal po sa'i dbang phyug de rang gi bu lung bstan pa thos nas/ bdag
112a1(mdo sde): gi bu sangs rgyas su lung bstan to zhes dbang po thams cad tshim par gyur to/ /de nas gzhon nu de lhag par yang dam bcas pa la brtan par byed do/ /'od srung gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de nas rgya
112a2(mdo sde): mtsho chen po yang thigs pa thigs pa nas phri bas ma mchis lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ ji lta bu yin/ bcom ldan 'das dper na tshong pa lam gyis 'tsho ba 'ga' zhig gis kAR+Sha pa Na dag bgrangs te/ bum par
112a3(mdo sde): sbas pa lam de nas de'i bu ngus nas 'gron bu dag stsal to/ /de nas de 'gron bu 'di nyung ngo zhes 'tshal bar 'gyur zhing de nas de dag thams cad bas par gyur pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
112a4(mdo sde): pos rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig phri ba yang yang dag par 'tshal la/ de bzhin du chab kyi lhag ma yang dag par 'tshal lags na bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems
112a5(mdo sde): can gyi phung po zad par mkhyen par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po de ni thigs pa ma mchis te/ de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma 'tshal gyi/
112a6(mdo sde): 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mkhyen lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung legs so/ /legs so/ /de de bzhin te/ sems can gyi phung po la zad pa med do/ /
112a7(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la bas pa mchis sam/ 'on te ma mchis/ bka' stsal pa/ sems can la zad pa med do/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can
112a8(mdo sde): bas pa ma mchis pa ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gal te zad pa yod na des na 'grib pa nyid yin la/ 'phel ba nyid yin na/ mdo 'di'i dgos pa chen por 'gyur bas sngar mdo 'dir tshigs su bcad pa sum
112b1(mdo sde): stong gsungs pa bsdus nas yang dag par btags pa las de dag thams cad rgyas par rig par bya'o/ /gal te tshigs su bcad pa sum stong yang dag par btags pa de las med na/ dge slong yangs pa la dad pa'i yid
112b2(mdo sde): can gyis zhus pa gang yin pa de kho na las legs par shes par gyis shig / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag thams cad ni rtag pa brtan pa zhi ba ther zug pa yin
112b3(mdo sde): no/ /rgyu gang gis na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang dag lags pa de dag bas par mi 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar khyams sam/ khang bzangs
112b4(mdo sde): dus dus su 'jig cing zhig na nam mkha' 'gyur ba de bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mgon po gang dang gang dag yin pa de dang de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du thar pa kho nar 'gyur ro/ /dper na Shi d+hu zhes bya
112b5(mdo sde): ba'i skad kyi byings kyi don ni ta zhes bya ba'i rkyen gyis de grub pa zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar na 'jig rten pa'i bstan bcos rnams la nA mA khya da u pa sa ga srid tang d+hi ta zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsdus pa'i
112b6(mdo sde): grub pa'i tshig de la grub pa zhes bya'o/ /grub pa'i tshig de grub pa gang yin pa de yang mi mngon pa med do/ /de bzhin du sems can gyis steng dang / 'og tu nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba zhi bar byas nas thar pa thob na yang skye
112b7(mdo sde): ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i srid pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /brda sprod pa ci dgar klog pa dag sid d+ha zhes bya ba gang yin pa de'i tshig de yang bi d+hu zhes bya bar byed de yang rang gis tshig bsdus nas rang gi tshig gi ngo bor
112b8(mdo sde): byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyud de'i phul du phyin pa'i phyir dang / slob ma rnams phul du phyin par bya ba'i phyir de 'di ltar sngon gyi yi ge dang / cho ga ci dag gam ma dag mi shes par gcad pa dang / dbye ba bslabs nas yang /
113a1(mdo sde): gcad pa dbye ba zhes bya bar byed do/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'di ltar thog ma rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sangs rgyas su dbang bskur ba
113a2(mdo sde): de nas bzung ste/ rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor ba na sems can ji tsam pa de srid du la lar 'byung ba/ la lar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston kyang de nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom pa nyid
113a3(mdo sde): kyi rgyus yang skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i srid pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'od srung khyod kyis ji ltar steng dang 'og tu grub pa ma grub pa'i tshig tu mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
113a4(mdo sde): shes par gyis shig / 'od srung sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gcig gis sangs rgyas gsum du 'gyur te/ shAkya mgon po'i sku gcig gis de dag thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du byed pa dang /
113a5(mdo sde): mi pham pa mi pham pa zhes bya ba mgon po byams par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / nga nyid ther zug pa yin te/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dag kyang nga nyid nga yin no zhes bya ba gang yin pa de dang de dag gsungs te/ gang
113a6(mdo sde): yang bskal pa 'di'i sangs rgyas stong po ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'o zhes bya ba de ltar shes par gyis shig / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i skad kyi dbyings ni mkhas shing rtogs pa'i skad kyi
113a7(mdo sde): dbyings yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi skad kyi dbyings dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i skad kyi dbyings ni de lta bu yin par gsungs so/ /ji ltar mkhas shing rtogs pa'i skad kyi dbyings nyams pa med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas
113a8(mdo sde): nga yang rtogs pa'i mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro/ /'od srung mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na thos na rang bzor byas pa'o zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung la skad kyi
113b1(mdo sde): dbyings mi snang bas grub pa'i skad kyi dbyings kyi mdo ni 'ga' zhig gis byas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi gsung la ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa mi snang na kha cig gis yang rang bzor byas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi gsung
113b2(mdo sde): la ni bdag mi snang na kha cig gis yang rang bzor byas so/ /yang gsung rab yan lag dgu la gang du yang mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i mdo mi snang na 'ga' zhig gis rang bzor byas so/ /mtshungs pa med
113b3(mdo sde): pa'i mdo 'di ni 'ga' zhig rang bzor byas par zad do zhes zer ro/ /dper na 'di ltar rgyal po gtong ba dang ldan par gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po de'i nor bsags pa'i bum pa mang po sa rum nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de
113b4(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji lta ji ltar rin po che gang dang gang dag shi ba dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / slong mo pa la sogs pa la bgo bsha' byed pa de lta de ltar de la 'jig rten du rin po che ya mtshan can de dang de dag 'byung
113b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs chen po la mkhas pa chos zab mo rin po che gang dang gang dag yin pa sems can rnams la chos bstan pa ston cing des chog shes pa dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa thog
113b6(mdo sde): mar byas nas/ de ltar chos ston pa la zhugs pa na dam pa ma yin pa'i rdzas spong ba'i mdo sde gang yin pa de dag 'thob par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang ldan pa'i sgo de lta bu
113b7(mdo sde): dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod pa nyid kyi mdo sde snying po can gyi le'u 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
113b8(mdo sde): 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos la gus par bgyid pa de ji lta bu lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe rung ba ma yin pa la rung ba'i 'du shes kyis spyod na'o/ /gsol pa/ ji lta bu lags bka' stsal pa/ dper na/
114a1(mdo sde): ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di'i drung du gang gi tshe rgyal po 'ga' zhig gi pho nya rigs dma' ba las skyes pa gdol ba bkren pa zhig 'ongs par gyur na/ de la rnga bo che dang / rol mo'i sgra mang po dang / glang
114a2(mdo sde): po che'i steng nas skad chen po sgrogs shing stan chen po bting nas rgyal po las dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / rgyan mang du 'thob par 'gyur zhing rgyal po rang yang gos bzang po
114a3(mdo sde): bgos nas stan mthon po las babs te/ glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dag yod bzhin du de'i mdun nas bsu ba'i phyir rkang gis 'gro zhing stan dang gding ba yod bzhin du de'i mdun na sa la 'dug par byed do/ /de ci'i
114a4(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten de dag gis gos dang rgyan du bcas pa byas par 'gyur mod kyi 'on kyang de rgyal po'i pho nya yin no zhes bkur sti byed do/ /de bzhin du chos smra ba'i mdun du gtam gyi dus na dge slong ngam/
114a5(mdo sde): khyim pas ji ltar nga'i spyan snga na stan dma' ba la 'dug nas lha'i phye ma dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / rgyan rnams kyis byed pa bzhin du bya'o/ /gang zhig de ltar spyod pa de la ya
