309b8(mdo sde): chen po sa'i snying pos dpal lha mo chen mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dpal cho ga shes bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyi 'byung ba chen po ma lus pa dag lha'i bde bar sprul nas 'dir sems can rnams
310a1(mdo sde): bskal pa 'bum phrag snyed kyi bar du longs spyod par bya bar nus kyang / 'dir sems can rnams kyis longs spyod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams dang bral ba ste/

312a2(mdo sde): par dus su dgongs pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par 'dzin pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /
312a3(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rtse bar 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad skye zhing 'phel ba dang / las 'phel ba dag las kun nas sgrol bar byed do/ /mya ngan las 'das pa bla na med pa la thug pa'i bar du dge ba'i chos
312a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /tad ya thA/ swa ra bra te/ na ya bra ti/ biSh+Tha tsha ti/ a na ya bra ti/ shA ra Na bra ti/ ku mu da bra ti/ sa~M tsi ra bra ti/ tshe da sa la bra ti/ sa ra bra te/ sa ra pa
312a5(mdo sde): ri hA re/ sa ra bra ta pa ri hA re/ nA ya na pra ta ba ri hA re/ bi bi d+he ka pa ri hA re/ ya dz+nyA pa ri hA re/ bin+du pa ri hA re/ dza la pa ri hA re/ k+She tra pa ri hA re/ da k+Sha pa ri hA re/ sa na sa pa ri hA re/ shra ba bA ng+rai / go ma ya ba Ne/ ma da sa khe/
312a6(mdo sde): su na yA D+ha dra dzo me la ban de a ra Na dzu She/ kha ra ba dzA b+he/ nA rA ya na bi dza b+he/ u ra ka /a ni mi She/ ku dza ra b+he/ dza ha ni ma b+he/ karma bir le/ shra ma sa li lai/ kha Da ka sha me/ a si nI ma/ ag+ni b+ha dre/ nang+ga tum+bu re/ ba ya be/ ba ru Ne/ kan+tha ni bra/ sha kra
312a7(mdo sde): dz+nyA ye/ aM na tshe bye nr-i na ya/ ni le trai yad+d+ha/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+thi te swA hA/ na rA ya ni ni la ye swA hA/ tsakra brta kra me swa hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bstan ma thag tu
312a8(mdo sde): de nas de'i mod la sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad kyi sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyang 'dar shig
312b1(mdo sde): shig ste/ 'khrugs shing skyo ba skyes nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
312b2(mdo sde): dpal cho ga shes khyod kyis 'byor byed chu khyim snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs ni de lta bu yin te/ de'i mthus rtsod pa dang / 'thab mo thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /klu khro bo dang / ma rungs pa thams cad zhi bar byed do/ /
312b3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin nas mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / tha na ri dgas dang / bya khro bo dang / ma rungs pa thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do/ /dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / nyi mas gdungs pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / than chen thams cad
312b4(mdo sde): rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /lo tog thams cad 'phel zhing 'grub par byed do/ /sems can rnams tshe ring bar byed do/ /longs spyod 'phel bar byed do/ /las 'phel ba sgrol bar byed pa'i bar du byed do/ /mya ngan las 'das
312b5(mdo sde): pa bla na med pa la thug gi bar du dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /la la zhig gzungs chen po 'di nyan tam/ klog gam/ sgrub par byed na de phyis 'gal
312b6(mdo sde): ba med pa'i chos dang / sdom pa gsum la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag gis kyang mtshon cha'i stobs shes bgyi ba'i
312b7(mdo sde): gzungs chen po bshad par bgyi'o/ /mtshon cha'i stobs shes bgyi ba'i gzungs des sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa thams cad kyi ched du sa'i bcud thams cad nyams par mi
312b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /sa'i bcud kyi mdangs rnams gang gis kyang dbrog par rngo mi thog lags so/ /dbugs gdug pa gtong ba 'am/ bskam par yang rngo mi thog lags so/ /
313a1(mdo sde): rtsub pa dang / ro ma mchis par bgyi bar rngo mi thog lags so/ /nyams pa dang ma mchis par bgyi bar rngo mi thog lags so/ /dog sa las lo thog mi 'khrung bar bgyi bar rngo mi thog lags so/ /rtsub
313a2(mdo sde): pa dang / ro ma mchis par bgyi bar rngo mi thogs lags so/ /lo tog gi sa bon dang / myu gu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog par rngo mi thog lags so/ /de la dbugs
313a3(mdo sde): gdug pa gtong ba'am/ bskor bar yang rngo mi thog lags so/ /rtsub pa 'am ro ma mchis par bgyi ba yang rngo mi thog lags so/ /ma smin pa rnams chab stsal bar yang rngo mi thog lags so/ /lhags pa dang / tsha ba dag
313a4(mdo sde): gis tshig pa dang / 'tshal du mi rung bar bgyi bar rngo mi thog lags so/ /'tshal ba tsam gyis sems can la la'i lus la dbugs gdug pa gtang bar rngo mi thog lags so/ /gzhi de lta bu las sems can rnams kyis
313a5(mdo sde): zas 'tshol ba slon nas lto bro 'tshal ba dang / yan lag dang nying lag bro 'tshal cing 'khums par bgyi bar rngo mi thog lags so/ /rims nad dang / brjed byed dang / sems g.yengs pa dang / dran pa nyams par bgyid
313a6(mdo sde): par rngo mi thog lags so/ /phan tshun thab mo dang dmag bgyid par rngo mi thog lags so/ /kha cig srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / sbyor ba nas log par lta ba la mi sbyor ba'i bar gyi chos de dag gis sems
313a7(mdo sde): can rnams kyi sems la sbyor la/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / mi'am ci dang / dri za dang / yi dags dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / mi 'am mi yin pa dag gis kyang sems
313a8(mdo sde): can rnams la gnod pa de lta bu dag bgyi bar rngo mi thog lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ nA bi ma hA nA bi k+Shu k+Sha ra nA be/ a bing gu nA be/ saM sho Sha na nA be/ ni rA dza kha b+he/ a ba ra mu ni/ ta ru Na ru he/ na rA pad tre/ dza ba pra me/ ma su ra tre/
313b1(mdo sde): ti mi ra pad tre/ khaN Da ni ra ha re/ tsak+Sho b+ha se/ ga Na bi me/ k+Shi ti two ye swA hA/ ang gu rak+Sha swA hA/ puSh+pa ma ye swA hA/ pha la ni ma b+he swA hA/ na mo to ye swA hA/ sha rI ra na ba kra ma ba shi swA hA/ dpal cho ga shes khyod kyi
313b2(mdo sde): mtshon cha'i stobs shes bya ba'i gzungs chen po ni de yin te/ mtshon cha'i stobs shes bya ba'i gzungs chen po'i mthu des ni sems can rnams la de lta bur rgyas par byed do/ /bde ba chen po skyed par byed do/ /
313b3(mdo sde): rgyu des na des sems can rnams myur du 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po de la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin
313b4(mdo sde): zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rigs kyi bu legs so/ /legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod ni sems can rnams kyi rtsi sman yin zhing sems can rnams kyi sman par gyur pa'o/ /
313b5(mdo sde): 'di ltar gling bzhi pa 'di'i sems can thams cad kyi 'bru dang / rtsi sman yin zhing sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o/ /bde bar sbyar ba thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /snying rje chen po kun nas slong ba dang
313b6(mdo sde): mtshungs par ldan pa'o/ /mtshon cha'i stobs shes bya ba'i gzungs chen po shin du zab pa de lta bu ston pa yin no/ /gzungs chen po des ni 'di na sems can rnams kyi sa'i bcud kyi mdangs dang / sa bon dang /
313b7(mdo sde): myu gu dang / mdab ma dang / me tog dang / ro dang / 'bru dang / sman rnams mi nyams shing skyon med la 'phel zhing 'byor par byed do/ /sems can gang dag gis zos pa de dag gi rgyud la rtsod pa'i rnyog pa thams cad
313b8(mdo sde): zhi bar byed do/ /'dir sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la spyod par 'gyur ro/ /gling bzhi pa 'dir dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / nyi mas gdungs pa dang / tsha ba dang / grang ba dang / char mo che dang /
314a1(mdo sde): than chen dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nyin mtshan dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / lo dang / dus tshigs log pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do/ /gzungs chen po bstan pa
314a2(mdo sde): des ni nga'i dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang / chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'dir mun pa can skal ba chung ba/ rgyags pa dang / dregs pas khengs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba
314a3(mdo sde): ma bskyed pa/ rgyal rigs gdol pa dang / blon po gdol pa dag gis 'di ltar nga'i bstan pa dka' bas bsgrubs pa dang / nga'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la 'tshe bar byed
314a4(mdo sde): pa nas rgyu des na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dag 'khrug par mi byed pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du sems can rnams la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad 'byung ba ni sngar ji skad gsungs pa bzhin no/ /
314a5(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo bcwa lnga pa ri'i snying po'i le'u las than chen rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mtshon pa ste gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di
314a6(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dpal lha mo cho ga shes sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i spyan sngar bdag cag gnyis kyis phan tshun dam bcas pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag gnyis kyi
314a7(mdo sde): bsam pa yongs su rdzogs shing grub po/ /de nas dpal lha mo chen mos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags te/ skol gyi bsam
314a8(mdo sde): pa rdzogs lags so/ /sngon skol gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i spyan sngar phan tshun dam bcas pa bzhin 'di ltar skol gyi bsam pa yongs su grub ste/ da ltar khyod nyid ni
314b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ste 'jig rten du byung la/ da ltar bdag gis ni dpal gyi go 'phang thob pa lags so/ /da ltar bdag gis sems can rnams la sems can yongs su smin par rngo mi thog par gyur pa de ci'i slad du
314b2(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di na klu glang po che lta bu dang / klu rta lta bu dang / klu sbrul lta bu dang / klu nya lta bu dang / klu sbal pa lta bu de dag dus 'dir yang bsgrub par bgyid lags so/ /bdag gis 'jig rten snang bar byed pa zab mo dag bstan
314b3(mdo sde): pa na gang dag dus ma lags pa'i lhags pa dang / tsha ba dang / sprin dang / khug rna dang / rdzi char dang / char mo che dang / than chen dag 'byung bar bgyid pa/ sems can rnams kyi lo tog dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu
314b4(mdo sde): dang / 'bru dang / sman rnams ma rung bar bgyid pa'i klu dang / klu chen po de dag ma bskrad lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dus 'dir da ltar gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na klu dang / klu chen po dang /
314b5(mdo sde): klu'i 'khor dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / gling bzhi pa 'di na gang kha cig klu'i skye gnas pa de dag thams cad da ltar 'dir mchis pa rnams dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
314b6(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag da ltar 'dus pa chen po 'dir mchis pa rnams dang / da ltar 'dir lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lha ma yin dang /
314b7(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dags dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po 'dus pa thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos mi dang mi yin pa de dag da ltar 'dus pa chen po 'dir chos nyan pa'i slad du/
314b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa'i sems can de dag thams cad zas bzhi la rten cing 'tsho bar bgyid lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da lta'i dus su klu khro bo phung bar bgyid pa dag zhi bar mdzad du
315a1(mdo sde): gsol/ gang dag klu khro bo rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la mngon par ma dad pas rtag par yang sgrub par bgyid pa/ sems can rnams la tho 'tshams pa/ sems can rnams kyi longs spyod pa dang /
315a2(mdo sde): nye bar longs spyod pa dag ma rung bar bgyid pa/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta ba/ sems can rnams la snying brtse ba ma mchis shing snying rje ma mchis par zhugs pa/ sdang ba/ rtsub pa lags te/ bdag sems can
315a3(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bgyid pa la bar chad bgyid pa lags pas/ de dag gi don du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po bskyed du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi sdig pa de thams cad zhi bar mdzad du
315a4(mdo sde): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i gnas na gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi spyan
315a5(mdo sde): sngar klu yongs su smin par brtson pas smon lam btab pa ci 'dra zhe na/ sngon dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi klu dang / klu chen po klu khro bo skye gnas bzhi pa dag dbugs gdug pa dang / klu rnams kyi
315a6(mdo sde): mig gdug pa dang / reg pa gdug pa dang / lce gdug pa dang / 'dod chags kyi dug dang / zhe sdang gi dug dang / gti mug gi dug dang / klu khro bo rnams kyi sdig pa'i chos dag ci nas kyang chos dang ldan pas bsal
315a7(mdo sde): bar nus par bya'o/ /ci nas kyang klu khro bo de dag gis sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / yo byad sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur bar bya'o/ /dkon mchog
315a8(mdo sde): gsum po de dag la dad pa dang / dga' ba thob par bya'o/ /da 'jig rten pha rol la blta ba dang bcas shing sdig pa'i chos rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes smon lam btab bo/ /de skad ces bka'
315b1(mdo sde): stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang dag klu khro bo de dag ni gnas der zhugs
315b2(mdo sde): te mchis nas klu rnam par bsgyings pa'i gnas shes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gnas par bgyi lags so/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus bdag gis de dag gi khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs
315b3(mdo sde): pa dang / 'dod chags de dag nye bar zhi bar bgyi lags so/ /de dag 'jam pa dang / snod du rung ba dang / sems zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / sems 'jig rten pha rol la blta bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad
315b4(mdo sde): la sems byams pa dang / snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba dang / sems brtse ba can du 'gyur bar bgyi lags so/ /klu khro bo dang / klu ma rungs pa rnams dad par 'gyur bar bgyi lags so/ /sems can thams cad
315b5(mdo sde): la mi 'tshe zhing snying brtse ba can gyi sems kyi sa la gnas par bgyi lags so/ /gzhan yang gang dag rdzi char dang / char mo che dang / than chen dang / sprin dang / sprin chen dang / lhags pa dang / tsha ba dag gis gnod
315b6(mdo sde): par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/ bdag gi ming brjod nas 'di skad du ri'i snying po thugs rje rgya che ba/ klu yongs su smin par mdzad pa/ bdag cag dran lags so/ /bla na med pa'i byang
315b7(mdo sde): chub la spyod par mdzad pa/ thabs dang ye shes sna tshogs la brtson pas mi spyod lags sam/ bdag cag sdug bsngal las thar bar mdzad du gsol/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes smra ba dag gis
315b8(mdo sde): 'di skad du brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ stam b+ha b+hu dza/ bi re Du b+hu dza/ go g+ha bi re dzra b+hu dza/ me ru b+hu dza/ ga tu ba b+hu dza/ hUM hUM/ a ne ba b+hu dza/ sma ra b+hu dza/ sma ra a brta b+hu dza/ ni ma ba b+hu dza swA hA/ btsun
316a1(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang kha cig klu khro bo de dag gi rgyus gnod pa dag gis gnod pa bgyis par gyur pa de lta bu de dag gis bdag gi ming nas brjod par bgyi zhing / klu khro ba/ nga rgyal
316a2(mdo sde): can/ dregs pa/ phrag dog dang / 'dod chags kyi sems zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du gsang sngags 'don pa na bdag gis lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas thos nas skye gnas bzhi pa'i klu dang /
316a3(mdo sde): klu chen po dang / klu rgan po dang / klu'i bu dang / klu'i 'khor rnams dad par ma bgyis sam/ dus ma lags par don ched ya nga ba la zhugs pa dag ma bzlog gam/ de'i tshe dus ma lags pa'i char mo che dang /
316a4(mdo sde): than chen dang / dus ma lags pa'i lhags pa dang / tsha ba dang / rlung dang / sprin dang / 'khrug pa dag rab tu zhi bar ma bgyis sam/ bdag gis bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems can de dag gi bsam pa
316a5(mdo sde): dag yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis na/ bdag gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bslus par gyur cig /bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
316a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar sems can yongs su smin par
316a7(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du smon lam brtan por btab ste/ shin du gnas par gyur lags so/ /de'i 'og du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag snyed 'tsho zhing gzhes pa 'khor
316a8(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar smon lam brtan po 'di lta bu dag btab ste/ bdag gis der rtag par sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du pha rol gnon pa'i brtson 'grus chen pos shin
316b1(mdo sde): du brtan par gnas par bgyi'o zhes brtson par bgyis lags so/ /da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yang klu khro bo rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du rtsol ba brtan por bgyis la/ bdag
316b2(mdo sde): gis de lta bu'i rtsol ba brtan pos brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni bskal pa grangs ma mchis par skad cig tsam yang gtang ma myong lags so/ /bdag gis rtag par pha rol gnon pa'i rtsol ba dang / brtson
316b3(mdo sde): pa brtan pos sems can yongs su smin par bgyis lags pa rnams kyang yang yongs su smin par bgyi lags so/ /gzhan yang bdag gis klu'i dbang po dag theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyis
316b4(mdo sde): lags te/ klu glang po che rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po shin du rab gnas 'di dang / klu sbrul rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo 'di gnyis dang / klu rta rnams kyi bdag po klu'i
316b5(mdo sde): rgyal po ma dros pa 'di dang / klu nya rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / klu sbal pa rnams kyi bdag po klu'i rgyal po yid bzang 'di rnams ste/ klu de lta bu dag ni sems can rnams la gnod
316b6(mdo sde): pa bgyid par rngo thogs pa dag go/ /klu'i rgyal po gzhan de lta bu de dag kyang rang rang gi mthus sems can rnams la de lta bur gnod pa bgyid par rngo thog pa dag go/ /'di ltar theg pa chen po la
316b7(mdo sde): rab tu zhugs pa'i rgyal po chen po de dag thams cad kyis kyang so so rang rang gi 'khor dang / dpung gi tshogs rnams dus ma lags par de lta bur ya nga ba bsgrubs pas rang rang gi 'khor rnams bskyod
316b8(mdo sde): par bgyid lags so/ /'di ltar 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa chos sgron ma dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung myur du mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du 'khor der mchis pa rnams kyis byang chub
317a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po klu'i drang srong la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsal to/ /de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po shin du rab gnas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
317a2(mdo sde): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la rten pa'i klu dang / klu'i rgyal po gang dag sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang / drod dang gsher las skye
317a3(mdo sde): ba dang / rdzus te skye ba'i klu de dag gang na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor nyan thos rnams dang / 'khor byang chub sems dpa' de dag la phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / yul 'khor der sha khon
317a4(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /gnod sems ma mchis pa dang / sems mnyam pas gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /gang dag yul 'khor de'i rgyal po de dag kyang bcom ldan
317a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi bstan pa la sems shin du dad par 'gyur lags so/ /de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa yang 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/ /dbang phyug gis rgyags pa dang dregs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa
317a6(mdo sde): 'jig par mi 'gyur lags so/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab tu byung nas skra bregs te gos
317a7(mdo sde): ngur smrig bgos pa/ snod du gyur pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa lhag pa'i bsam pa can rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'dzin par bgyid lags so/ /gzhan yang yul 'khor de na gang dag mi rnams
317a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa de'i tsher mar gyur pa de dag chos dang ldan pas skrod par bgyid lags so/ /de nas yul 'khor der dge sbyong dang / bram ze bsod snyoms pa rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po dag gis sngon
317b1(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyin pa phul ba rnams rgyal rigs dge bas 'phrog par mi bgyid la/ rgyal rigs dge ba blon po dang / mdun na 'don dang / skye bo dmag mi rnams dang bcas pas tshogs sbyor
317b2(mdo sde): ba ni don ched la brtson pa lags so/ /snying po blangs pa lags so/ /lag brkyang nas lhug par gtong ba lags te/ rgyal rigs dge ba de yul 'khor dang bcas par srung bar bgyi lags so/ /yongs su
317b3(mdo sde): bskyang bar bgyi lags so/ /de'i yul phyogs na rtsod pa'i rnyog pa thams cad dang / so so'i 'khor dag sngar ji skad bstan pa bzhin bskrad par bgyi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gos ngur smrig kha bsgyur
317b4(mdo sde): ba 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyal mtshan lags so/ /mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba rnams kyi
317b5(mdo sde): lam lags so/ /nyon mongs pa rnams kyi ral gri lags so/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon lags so/ /lam las rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi sgron ma lags so/ /phung po rnams kyi sman lags so/ /
317b6(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i mun pa'i rlung lags so/ /ngan 'gro rnams kyi sgrogs shing lags so/ /nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyis nyams par gyur pa rnams kyi skyug sman lags so/ /dgra rnams kyi rdo rje lags so/ /
317b7(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi gter lags so/ /sdig pas gos pa rnams kyi chab lags so/ /nongs pa bgyid pa rnams kyi me long lags so/ /sems g.yengs pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin lags so/ /
317b8(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi za ma tog lags so/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi sa gzhi lags so/ /gzungs rnams kyi nor bu lags so/ /bzod pa rnams kyi khyim lags so/ /sa rnams kyi snod lags so/ /
318a1(mdo sde): phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyi mkhar lags so/ /nad pa rnams kyi sman pa lags so/ /bslab pa rnams kyi ri lags so/ /nyon mongs pas kun nas gdungs pa rnams kyi zla ba lags so/ /lta ba ngan
318a2(mdo sde): par ltung ba rnams kyi nyi ma lags so/ /ye shes kyi rgya mtsho lags so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs pa rnams kyi phreng bar gyur pa lags so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bum pa bzang po lags so/ /
318a3(mdo sde): chos gos ngur smrig 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba lags so/ /chos gos ngur smrig 'di ni sems can rnams la chos kyi char dbab pa'i don gyi slad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin
318a4(mdo sde): gyis brlabs pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par bgyid cing dge slong dag la tho 'tsham par bgyid pa nas/
318a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab tu byung ba snod du gyur pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa'i lus la gnod pa bgyid pa dang / nor 'phrog pa dang / srog gi bar chad dag bgyid pa'i bar du'o/ /yul 'khor der
318a6(mdo sde): gang dag sangs rgyas la dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / grul bum dang / yi dags mthu bo che de dag thams cad kyang rgyal rigs gdol pa la gshe bar 'gyur
318a7(mdo sde): te/ de dag gis de'i yul 'khor du thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / lo nyes dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dag 'byung bar bgyid lags/ /dus ma lags pa'i char mo che dang / than chen dang /
318a8(mdo sde): lhags pa dang / tsha ba dang / rlung dang / nyi mas gdungs pa dag gis sa bon dang / myu gu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro rnams ma rung bar bgyid kyang de
318b1(mdo sde): na klu rnams la skyon ni ma mchis lags te/ de na klu rnams rgyu des na grags pa ma lags pas ni gos par 'gyur lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das te por bgyi na yul gyi bud med bzang
318b2(mdo sde): mos zas ngan pa 'tshal nas de dbugs dri mi bda' bar 'gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du rgyal rigs gdol pas kyang rgyal rigs kyi chos rnams spangs nas dmangs rigs kyi chos rnams spyod
318b3(mdo sde): par bgyid na/ yul phyogs thams cad srung ba'i lha nas yi dags mthu bo che dag gis bar du khros par 'gyur te/ de dag gis yul 'khor ma rung bar bgyid la/ klu dang klung chen po rnams grags
318b4(mdo sde): pa ma lags pas kyang gos par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po rgyal po rnams rgyal po'i bslab pa'i gzhi gnas par bstan pa de dang de dag mtho ris
318b5(mdo sde): dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la brtson pa yin no/ /gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa rgyal rigs kyi bslab pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa'i bar la gzhol ba
318b6(mdo sde): yin no/ /klu'i bdag po nga rang gi 'khor bslab pa las mi 'da' bar bstan pa des na de dag da ltar gyi dus dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus su nga'i bstan pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par mi
318b7(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul 'khor gang dang gang dag na grong dang /
318b8(mdo sde): grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags kyi gnas yul 'khor de na bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos tshul khrims dang ldan zhing thos pa mang po sbyin gnas de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis
319a1(mdo sde): pa der bdag gi 'khor gang dag klu dang / klu mo dang / klu rgan po dang / klu rgan mo dang / klu'i bu pho dang / klu'i bu mo dang / klu'i 'khor pho dang / klu'i 'khor mo rnams dus ma lags par rdzi char
319a2(mdo sde): dang / ser drag dang / char mo che dang / than chen dag gtong bar bgyid dam/ lhags mo che dang / shin du tsha ba dang / nyi mas gdungs pa dag 'byung bar bgyid dam/ sems can rnams kyi lo tog dang /
319a3(mdo sde): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman gyi ro dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag chab 'tshal bar bgyid na klu de dag gis bdag bslus pas de'i lus thams cad 'khums par
319a4(mdo sde): gyur cig / de dag rdzu 'phrul dang bral nas 'gro mi nus par gyur cig /rims nad kyis gdungs par gyur cig /longs spyod thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig /spobs pa med par gyur cig /
319a5(mdo sde): don byed mi nus par gyur cig ces mnas bsgag par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ nA ga dza na du she/ nA ga d+ha ra gU g+h+ra gU g+h+ra/ dza la gU g+h+ra/ a bi mA ra ge/ sa ha sra mu khe/ ka la ti ma pu se/ nA ga stam
319a6(mdo sde): b+ha ri/ dza ya ba pha le/ bi mu sha krai swA hA/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor kyis de nyid du legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nyid kyi tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i klu'i 'khor rnams shugs drag por
319a7(mdo sde): 'khrugs shing dngangs par gyur to/ /de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo gnyis stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di
319a8(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag gzhan la sbyin par ma dad cing bdag nyid longs spyod par 'tshal la/ 'jungs pa longs
319b1(mdo sde): spyod la sems kun du 'dzin cing lag mi rkyang bas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / 'dron po slong ba rnams kun nas tshim par mi bgyid lags so/ /pho brang 'khor dang / ljongs kyi
319b2(mdo sde): mi dang / 'khor rnams yang dag pa'i bde bas tshim par mi bgyid lags so/ /rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag la yul phyogs srung ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / grul

319b4(mdo sde): lags so/ /'bru dang / sman gyi ro rnams ma rung bar bgyid kyang de na klu dang / klu chen po rnams la skyon ni ma mchis lags te/ de na klu rnams rgyu des na grags pa ma lags pas ni gos par 'gyur
319b5(mdo sde): lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na phyi sa khung gi dri ma bda' ba bser mas 'tshal na dri mi bda' bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal rigs gdol pa rnams kyis

320a6(mdo sde): A ka la k+She/ bi sha ne/ bi mArga k+She/ ku na bi ra ge/ a ta sa le/ na yan tu ma b+he/ kA la ku she/ nang gu pra b+he/ gan d+ha ra pa se swA hA/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so/ /zhes bgyi
320a7(mdo sde): ba stsal lags so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa zhes bya ba nas sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o/ /tad+ya thA/ na ba b+hi she/ na ba na mi b+hi she/ A no k+She/ na ba kunyadza b+hi she/ kha ga bai kha/ sa ra tra na n+ya/
320a8(mdo sde): pA pa ya si le/ na rA ya Na gu Ne/ bi na sta le/ da sha kra mai/ a k+Shu da nye se/ A ni sa be swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po chu lha zhes bya ba nas sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi ma be me/ pa li k+Shi na
320b1(mdo sde): gu ne/ ru Na bin du tri Nai/ tsa rak+Sha d+ha re/ me g+ha sang gra me/ byA pu Tu ka she/ dru mo de/ ma ye ta na ku se/ tsa ra ma hi ke/ tsa lang ge/ nA na da tre/ ka Tu ka t+ya le swA hA/ sngar ji skad gsungs pa'i bar du'o/ /de'i
320b2(mdo sde): tshe klu'i rgyal po yid bzangs stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la rten pa'i klu dang / klu
320b3(mdo sde): chen po de dag ni sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba dag lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal rigs
320b4(mdo sde): gdol pa de dag gis rgyal rigs kyi chos spangs nas dmangs rigs kyi chos rnams spyod par bgyid de/ sems can dmyal ba mnar ma mchis pa'i bar dag la gzhol bar gnas so/ /

320b6(mdo sde): 'gyur lags so/ /de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la bkur sti bgyi zhing gzung bar bgyi ste/ dper bgyi na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des yul gyi bud med
320b7(mdo sde): bzang mo khrus legs par bgyis te spos kyis byugs nas gos mchog tu bzang ba bskon te/ yan lag gi dam pa mgo bo la rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i phreng ba mang po dag btags shing dpung
320b8(mdo sde): rgyan dang / gser skud dang / sor gdub dang / lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dag gis brgyan nas glang po che'i bzhon pa la bskyon te/ 'khor phal mo che dang lhan cig khrid pa de bzhin du da ltar 'khor
321a1(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag cag klu rnams dud 'gro'i skye gnas su bsdus pa'i lus ma snad ma nyams la/ mchog tu khro ba dang /
321a2(mdo sde): nga rgyal dang / dregs pa'i dri mas bsgos pa/ bdag cag klu thams cad rgyags pas myos pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyis chus bkrus lags so/ /bdag cag la ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i gos
321a3(mdo sde): bskon lags so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi phreng bas bcings lags so/ /bdag cag gi sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dag bzod pa dang / gzungs dang /
321a4(mdo sde): sa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan lags so/ /theg pa chen po'i shing rta dag gis bteg lags so/ /gang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang bral ba shin du yongs su dag par
321a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs yongs su dag pas bskor nas theg pa chen po'i chos kyi gtam dag pa dag ston pa der bdag cag mchi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/
321a6(mdo sde): da ltar bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la bkur sti bgyid cing 'dzin par bgyid lags so/ /de lta lags pas bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la
321a7(mdo sde): shin du gnas par bgyid lags so/ /grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags kyi gnas gang dang gang na sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
321a8(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa dang / theg pa chen po pa dag khyim na gnas pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba 'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ thos pa mang ba 'am/ thos pa nyung ba 'am/
321b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa 'am/ le lo can nam/ mnyam par bzhag pa 'am/ mnyam par ma bzhag pa 'am/ dran pa dang ldan pa 'am/ dran pa nyams pa rnams bcom ldan 'das dang /
321b2(mdo sde): chos dang / dge 'dun dang / 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims dag la dga' zhing dang ba dag bkur sti dang / bla mar bgyid pa dang / ri mo bgyid pa dang / byang chub rnam gsum gang yang rung ba
321b3(mdo sde): dag la rab tu zhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos sbyin gnas de lta bu dag gnas shing mchis pa de dang der bdag cag yid kyis dga' zhing dad pa dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar bgyi
321b4(mdo sde): ba dang / ri mo dag gis gnas par bgyi lags so/ /yul 'khor de dang / de'i grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags der bdag gi 'khor klu dang / klu mo dang / klu rgan pho dang /

322a1(mdo sde): bud+ha dza ye/ ba le k+She/ a ma ni me/ b+hu ta sa li le/ a na mad d+h+ya/ pra t+ya ni le/ a ba ni la me/ khi la sho me/ nastu pi pA le/ dzi sa dzi hA/ skan d+ha pA le/ b+ha ra ni kri ye swA hA/ der thams
322a2(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams bzhin dang mig yid du 'ong bas shin du dgod cing / thal mo sbyar nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad du skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can thams cad la phan
322a3(mdo sde): par 'dod pa yin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar bya ba ni legs so legs so zhes smras nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i klu'i 'khor de dag shugs drag po 'khrugs shing dngangs la kun tu 'gul

322a5(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / bcas pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa blun po mkhas so snyam pa'i
322a6(mdo sde): nga rgyal can/ nga rgyal dang rgyags pas nyams pa/ 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta ba/ g.yo sgyu can/ snying rje ma mchis pa/ dge slong la tho 'tsham par bgyid pa nas tha na bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du skyabs
322a7(mdo sde): su mchis nas nye bar gnas pa/ skra bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos pa la tho 'tsham pa dag 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du rab tu byung ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ dkon
322a8(mdo sde): mchog gsum gyi gdung 'bar bar bgyid pa dag la tho 'tsham pa'i rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis mnas bsgag par bgyi ba ni longs spyod kyis 'khrugs par gyur cig / rgyal phran

322b3(mdo sde): par gyur cig / 'byung ba chen pos 'khrugs par gyur cig /yi dags mthu bo ches 'khrugs par gyur cig ces bgyi ba nas/ rgyal rigs kyis 'khrugs par gyur cig /bram ze dang / dmangs
322b4(mdo sde): rigs dang / bud med dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / spyang ki dag gis 'khrugs par gyur cig ces bgyi ba'i bar du rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag mnas bsgags par bgyi lags so/ /tad+ya thA/
322b5(mdo sde): ba ne ya ba na pa le/ ma hA brta na trai/ dru mats+tsha Te/ ku su ma pa ra Te yu ga ta/ sam b+hA k+She/ bi ma dri bi k+She/ sa le pa na ya/ pa ra be rai/ b+hU ma dru kra me/ nai ran ta na/ dza si la me na trai/ bai ma ba ta ma shra ma dz+we/
322b6(mdo sde): na ya na hing ku le/ pi bad tsha/ b+h+ri se/ d+ha na mu tse/ sang ga byo k+Shai/ pa la min d+ha di le/ d+hU mi paSh+Te/ ro ma da lai/ ba na ga dzai/ tU Ta pa Te/ A pa Te D+ha/ na ya driSh+Ti/ dzi hwA kra ne/ u ta rak+She/
322b7(mdo sde): gan d+har b+he si mi swA hA/ gang dag rgyal rigs gdol pa 'jig rten pha rol la mi lta zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la mtho 'tsham pa de dag de ltar gyur cig /de'i tshe thams
322b8(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i dri za'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la tho 'tsham par bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag la bdag cag ci dga'
323a1(mdo sde): bgyid du stsal du gsol/ bdag cag rang rang gi gnas na rtsed mo la chags shing yongs su spyod par bgyid dam/ dga' skyid nyams su myong bar bgyid na bdag cag kyang
323a2(mdo sde): mna'i khongs su gtogs par gyur cig / de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
323a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sa'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin
323a4(mdo sde): thams cad la rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi srog shing zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo chen po bshad par bgyi ste/ rgyal mtshan gyi srog shing zhes bya ba'i gzungs
323a5(mdo sde): chen po'i sgo gang gi rna lam du grag pa de'i rna ba'i nad dag rab tu zhi bar bgyid do/ /de'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid do/ /
323a6(mdo sde): gal te na bsrabs par 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho'i shun pa man dza na la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis nas rgyal rigs kyi rnga la bskus nas rnga de'i sgra gang dang gang gi
323a7(mdo sde): rna lam du grag pa de dang de'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams bsrabs par 'gyur ro/ /de dang de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga'
323a8(mdo sde): zhing bkur sti dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dag rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rjes su 'brang bas 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pha rol la lta ba dang / longs
323b1(mdo sde): spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dang mi 'bral la sems can thams cad kyi mig tu 'ong ba dang / snying du sdug par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ pUrba mArga a ma lo ma ta/ k+Shit+ti li/ b+h+ru bai pa na kha na/ Dai durma
323b2(mdo sde): khi lai/ mat+sa du lai/ gau ra san+d+hai na/ k+Shu ba ra mai/ bud+d+ha rash+mi ping+ga lai g+h+ra ma/ lo ho tA ra b+he/ nang+ga la sUr+ye/ b+ha ga ba ri Na/ an d+harba/ u re/ ka ra hru dze/ ke sha lo he sa mA d+hi d+hu re swA hA/ de nas de nyid du bcom ldan
323b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo / /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad
323b4(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dbyangs dang / sgra brjod par bgyid pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po de bshad
323b5(mdo sde): par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bdag la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad du gsol/ de ni mthu che zhing stobs che la pha rol gnon pa snang bar bgyid
323b6(mdo sde): pa chen po lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams kyi thos pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gter dang / ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gter du 'gyur ba lags so/ /
323b7(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sdom pa la gnas pa 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / dge sbyong gi sdom pa dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sdom pa la
323b8(mdo sde): gnas pa snod du gyur pa dang / snod du ma gyur pa dag gis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po 'di lhag mthong gi sbyor bas nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du klog
324a1(mdo sde): na phyir zhing nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la rtog par 'gyur ro/ /nyin mtshan bdun 'das nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po lan 'bum
324a2(mdo sde): snyed du yang dang yang dran par bgyid pa de ni rgyal rigs rnams dang / bram ze'i rigs rnams dang / rje'u rigs rnams dang / dmangs rigs rnams dad par bgyid pa nas sems can thams
324a3(mdo sde): cad kyi bar du shin du mngon par dad par bgyid pa lags so/ /thams cad longs spyod pa dang / yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po mchog dang mi 'bral zhing mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur
324a4(mdo sde): lags so/ /de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ tri na sa nyi ke/ bi tri Na bi ma be/ ka ra prA k+She/ b+hu ta sU me tsa/
324a5(mdo sde): pa ra dzi me/ a b+ha k+She/ a k+Sha ya lo be/ ad+h+ya ma/ ni mi re/ shI ta bista re/ a gu dza d+hA dz+nyA/ dza dza ra No sai/ a na sa shud+d+he/ mri ga g+hi k+She/ ku la ba Te/ ma ga bA bA/ k+She b+hau ba swa re/ a b+hi ti ma b+hu ra/
324a6(mdo sde): sa ra kha dze smri ti mo ni swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi
324a7(mdo sde): smon lam gyi tshul zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di bshad pas sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyis thos pa'i mig kun tu ston par byed la/ nga'i bstan pa yang rton par byed pa ni legs so
324a8(mdo sde): legs so/ /de nas de nyid du thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad du skyes bu
324b1(mdo sde): d am pa khyod kyis gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rdzogs par bshad pas da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
324b2(mdo sde): sems can de dag thams cad kyi mos pa mang po'i tshogs rgyas par byed pa dang ston pa ni skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/ /de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/
324b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gling bzhi pa 'di'i me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / shing dang /
324b4(mdo sde): 'bru dang / sman dang / lo tog dag bsrung bar 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dang / rtswa dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma sa la rten pa rnams bsrung bar 'tshal
324b5(mdo sde): lo/ /bcom ldan 'das nang gu dpal gyi rdul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po de da ltar 'dir gling bzhi pa de dag gis sngon ma thos ma mthong bas 'di ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar gyur te/
324b6(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po de lta bu dag byung bar bgyis lags so/ /nang gu dpal rdul zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di ni mthu che bas lo tog thams cad 'phel bar bgyid pa lags so/ /sa bon dang / myu gu
324b7(mdo sde): dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / shing dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro rnams skyed par bgyid pa dang / 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / snum mchis par bgyis pa dang / 'jam
324b8(mdo sde): par bgyid pa dang / mang por bgyid pa lags so/ /sems can thams cad dad par bgyid pa dang / tshul khrims can du bgyid pa dang / thos par bgyid pa dang / shes par bgyid pa dang / byams
325a1(mdo sde): pa dang / snying rje can du bgyid pa dang / thabs dang ldan par bgyid pa nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du ston par bgyid pa lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ a na N+ya b+ha mi/
325a2(mdo sde): ga ba k+Sha bi dze/ gu lo tsa lo me/ pha ta k+Sha lo me/ shrI ya k+Sha ku su me na/ ba ku mud me De/ rA dza ba ra me/ tsa Ta na ba/ ba ma Te/ bi Shu lang ge/ a ba b+ha su ne ha sa ga bA k+She/ lo ma b+hu dze k+She/ gam b+hi ra ba
325a3(mdo sde): su me/ a no ma ya/ sa re ba la sha to ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nang gu dpal rdul zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te sbreng bar bgyid dam/
325a4(mdo sde): skad chen por sgrog gam/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di chu la lan stong gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis nas zhing dang / shing dang / lo tog sna tshogs la gtor tam rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / dung dag
325a5(mdo sde): la bsngags nas de dag gi sgra gang du thos pa'i lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman gyi ro dang / sa la rten pa'i lo tog thams cad sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa'i
325a6(mdo sde): rgyu lus pa ma gtogs par lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / yi dags mthu bo che dang / bdud dang / bdud kyi bu dang / bdud kyi 'khor gyi tshogs gang gis kyang gnod par bgyi ba 'am/ chud gzan
325a7(mdo sde): pa 'am/ tshig par bgyi ba 'am/ bskam pa 'am/ mdangs 'phrogs pa 'am/ mthu chung bar bgyi ba 'am/ ma mchis par bgyi ba dag tu rngo mi thog na sems can dang / sems can gyi grangs su
325a8(mdo sde): gtogs pa gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod gling bzhi pa 'dir sbyin
325b1(mdo sde): pa chen po'i dpal gyi shing rta la zhon nas/ rigs kyi bu 'dir bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam du sems can dpag tu med pa rnams rton par byed pa ni rigs kyi bu khyod legs so legs so/ /de nas
325b2(mdo sde): de nyid du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar byas pa ni legs so legs so/ /
325b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byams pa khyod la bdag gis dpal me
325b4(mdo sde): tog gsar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po sbyin gyis/ gzungs chen po de nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byams pa chen po'i go bgos nas/ 'dir sems can rnams la tshig gis chos ston
325b5(mdo sde): na ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i chos de dag sems can gang dag gis thos pa'i sdig pa'i sems dang / sdig pa'i lta ba dag spong bar byed do/ /sdig pa'i grogs po
325b6(mdo sde): dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen dag spong bar byed do/ /sems kyis byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yid la byed par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang /
325b7(mdo sde): sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba can du 'gyur ro/ /sems mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag las ldog par 'gyur ro/ /sems dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la rnam par gnas par
325b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /sems sems can thams cad la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos kyi char 'bebs
326a1(mdo sde): par byed pa'i dgra thams cad rab tu dad par byed cing bshes gnyen thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /tad ya thA/ li ba ta swa re kA shA ya/ bar me sa me bag g+he/ dwa rang ga dza le
326a2(mdo sde): su to k+Sha/ su to k+She su ma ta b+ha k+Share su ha bung ge/ gau a ba lo ka da le/ sid d+hi b+hi ba k+She/ D+ha nan bi ba re/ a bin d+ha lung bi/ so tsa ra tsa la/ a ba b+ha sa re/ ba ra ha shat+t+re/ e ka ha da to ye/ sa mA d+hi ka ra Ni/ ba la
326a3(mdo sde): dza bi ti/ ma hA d+ha b+hu ta ku se/ a ra Na nI le/ ma le ma she me/ nI la ku su me swA hA/ dpal me tog ser po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi byams pa chen
326a4(mdo sde): po'i go bgos nas sems can rnams la chos ston na/ de'i sgra tha na sems can srog chags su gyur pa phra mo chung ngu gang dag gi rna lam du grag pa de dag gi sems kyi rnyog pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang /
326a5(mdo sde): de dag gi sems dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnas par yang 'gyur na mir gyur pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sems can la la dag gis char dbab pa'i phyir dri za dang / klu'i gnas dag tu gzungs chen
326a6(mdo sde): po 'di bzlas brjod byas te/ na le sham gyi phye ma dang / e ran da'i mar du bsres pa la des lan stong du bsngags nas/ gos kyi mtha' mar phur ma byas te khron par bcug na/ des na de la klu rnams
326a7(mdo sde): dga' bar 'gyur te/ char gyi rgyun chen po yang 'bebs par byed do/ /de'i tshe yul der 'dus pa'i klu dang / klu chen po rnams kyis dpal me tog sar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di thos nas
326a8(mdo sde): sems rangs pa dang / sdang sems med pa dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems byams pa dang ldan pa dang / sems 'jig rten pha rol la lta bar gnas par gyur to/ /sems dkon mchog
326b1(mdo sde): gsum la dad cing bkur sti dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dag thob par gyur to/ /sems dud 'gror skye ba'i rang gi sdig pa'i las dag rab tu 'chags pa dang / sems theg pa chen po bla na
326b2(mdo sde): med pa la 'jug par gnas par gyur to/ /klu dang / klu chen po de dag thams cad kyi nang nas mthu ci yod pa dang / ci nas pa dag gis de na bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir kha cig ni
326b3(mdo sde): gser mang po'i char mngon par 'bebs so/ /kha cig ni dngul dang / a ga ru dang / rgya spos dang / gau shiR+Sha dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i char dag mngon par 'bebs
326b4(mdo sde): pa nis kha cig ni ut+pa la dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs dang / gser skud dang / mu tig gi do shal gyi
326b5(mdo sde): bar dag gi char mngon par 'bebs so/ /de nas klu dang / klu chen po de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces
326b6(mdo sde): gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar bdag cag ni dkon mchog gsum la sems shin du legs par rab tu zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag
326b7(mdo sde): 'di rnams kyis dam bca' bar bgyi ba ni btsun pa bcom ldan 'das grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs gang dang / gang dag na dpal me tog sar pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po 'di
326b8(mdo sde): rab tu sgrogs pa dang / de bzhin du gzungs lhag ma chu khyim snying po zhes bgyi ba dang / mtshon cha'i stobs shes bgyi ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan gyi smon lam gyi tshul zhes bgyis ba dang /
327a1(mdo sde): nang gu dpal rdul zhes bgyi ba dang / dpal me tog sar pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis bshad pa'i gzungs de dag dang / klu'i snying po bzhi po dag
327a2(mdo sde): grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags kyi gnas gang dang gang dag tu re re tsam yang ston tam/ 'chad dam/ rab tu sgrogs sam/ dran par bgyid pa de dang de dag tu
327a3(mdo sde): bdag cag gis dus dus su char 'bebs pa dang / gdugs dang / bser ma dag gtong bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma lags par ni ma lags so/ /de dang der bdag cag gis phyi dgra dang / nang 'khrug dang /
327a4(mdo sde): thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / gnod sems dang / nad dang / mi ngas dang mu ge dag zhi bar bgyi lags so/ /de dang der bdag cag gis skyid pa dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bsgrub
327a5(mdo sde): par bgyi lags so/ /de dang der sems can rnams kyi sa bon dang / myu gu dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / shing dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dag mi nyams par 'phel bar
327a6(mdo sde): bgyi lags so/ /longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa phal cher dri zhim pa dang / ro zhim pa dang / snum pa dang / 'jam pa dag tu bsgrub par bgyi lags so/ /bdag cag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i
327a7(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / 'khon ma mchis pa'i sems dang / rtsod pa ma mchis pa'i sems su bsgrub par bgyi lags so/ /
327a8(mdo sde): de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / gnod sbyin rnams nas dge bsnyen dag gi bar dag tu byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bsgrub par bgyi lags so/ /
327b1(mdo sde): gang na gzungs chen po 'di rab tu sgrogs pa der ni nang phan tshun sems 'thun par bsgrub par bgyi lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad la legs so legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo / /thams
327b2(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ri'i snying po'i kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
327b3(mdo sde): dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dpal cho ga shes khyod la snying brtse ba'i grogs 'di dag yod na 'dir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir da dung du ci'i phyir gdul ba'i tshogs
327b4(mdo sde): rnams gzhug par mi nus/ dpal lha mo chen mos gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa thams cad du de lta
327b5(mdo sde): bur skye ba len cing grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'thun pa de lta bu dag dang phrad pa thob lags so/ /da ltar bdag kyang grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'thun pa khyod lta bu dang phrad pa lags so/ /
327b6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang de'i lag tu thob ste/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang brjod par bgyi lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes
327b7(mdo sde): gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu gnas par blta bar bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal cho ga shes
327b8(mdo sde): khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de ltar yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan
328a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad du de lta bur skye ba len la/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag la brtson zhing der brtson pa brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no/ /grogs dge ba'i bshes gnyen de
328a2(mdo sde): lta bus yongs su zin pa yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de'i lag tu thob pa yin te/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa yang brjod par bya'o/ /des rnam par gnon pa
328a3(mdo sde): yang brjod par bya'o/ /mngal gyi skyon las thar bar yang brjod par bya'o/ /mi slob pa'i sa la gnas pas zag pa zad par yang brjod par bya'o/ /de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad
328a4(mdo sde): kyis dgongs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs par yang brjod par bya'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la shin du gnas par brjod par bya'o/ /de nas brgya byin gzi brjid dri ma med pa/ bcom ldan
328a5(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir klu dang / klu chen po rnams sems can rnams kyi
328a6(mdo sde): longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod par bgyid lags/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po rgyu dang rkyen gnyis kyis 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir klu dang / klu chen po rnams sems can
328a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag la gnod par byed do/ /gnyis gang zhe na/ 'dod chags kyi dbang dang / khro ba'i dbang gis dus ma yin pa'i sprin dag 'byung bar byed cing rdzi'i char dang /
328a8(mdo sde): ser drag dag 'bebs par byed do/ /lhags pa dang / tsha ba dag 'byung bar byed do/ /des na 'dir sems can rnams kyi sa bon dang / myu gu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang /
328b1(mdo sde): sman dang / ro dag tshig par byed do/ /skems par byed do/ /'brul bar byed do/ /ma rungs par byed do/ /des na sems can rnams longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dang / mi ldan pas lus
328b2(mdo sde): dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sdig pa'i las mi bzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag kun du spyod par byed do/ /las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa des na sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa thams cad kyang sreg par byed do/ /
328b3(mdo sde): skems par byed do/ /thal bar rlog par byed do/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag spong zhing ngan song gsum po dag la gzhol bar byed do/ /kha cig gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba tsam gyi phyir tshe gcig gis
328b4(mdo sde): de lta bur sdig pa'i las mtshams med pa dag gi bar du kun du spyod par byed de/ de bskal pa mang po zhig gi bar phyis mir skye ba 'thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te de dag yun ring po 'das nas brgya la brgya
328b5(mdo sde): lam na mi'i lus thob na yang kha cig ni yan lag nyams par 'gyur ro/ /kha cig ni dran pa nyams par 'gyur ro/ /gdol pa'i rigs su yang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /g.yung po'i rigs dang / smyug ma mkhan gyi
328b6(mdo sde): rigs dang / bkren pa dbul po'i rigs rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bza' ba dang btung ba'i longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag dang yang bral bar 'gyur la/ yang rgyu des na dge ba'i bshes gnyen
328b7(mdo sde): dang bral nas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa dag kun du spyod par byed do/ /yang kha cig ngan song gsum po dang / mnar med pa dag tu yang gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar
328b8(mdo sde): longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'khor bar yun ring du nyam thag par 'gyur ro/ /ngan song gsum po dag tu sdug bsngal mi bzad pa sna tshogs dag nyams su myong bar
329a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ sdug bsngal gang cung zad ci byung ba thams cad ni zas kyi rkyen las gyur pa lags te/ zas ma mchis na sdug bsngal 'byung ba yang ma mchis lags so/ /de nas
329a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe brgya byin gzi brjid dri ma med pas tshigs su bcad de 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sred pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na/ /ngu ba dang ni rgod par bgyid/ /nye bar gnas shing ltung bar bgyid/ /kun du spyod
329a3(mdo sde): cing rnam par rgyug / sa gzhi dag la til brdungs ltar/ /sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor gnod par bgyid/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad la/ /de ltar sred pas gnod par bgyid/ /kye ma srid pa'i
329a4(mdo sde): zhags pa yis/ /srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar gtugs pas/ /de ltar zhags 'di rgya che ba/ /kha zas dag gi rgyu las byung / /so so'i skye bo rgyu gnyis kyi/ /sred pa'i rdul gyis yan lag bcings/ /ri dgas
329a5(mdo sde): zhags pas bcings pa ltar/ /'bros pa dag tu nus ma lags/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten sems can dag /sred pas gar bgyid rtsol ba ltar/ /gar gzhung dag la gar mkhan brgyas/ /de nas gar
329a6(mdo sde): bgyid rtsol mi nus/ /sred pa'i dug gis bsgyur bas na/ /ji ltar skye bo myos pa ltar/ /btung ba myos bgyid bslad pa yis/ /myos pa dag tu mi bgyid do/ /sred pa'i gnod sbyin gdon dag gis/ /skye bo
329a7(mdo sde): brlams nas 'khyal ba ltar/ /'byung po'i gdon gyis myos pa dag /'khyal ba dag du mi bgyid do/ /nor 'dzin de dag 'dzin pa btang / /sred pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par spongs/ /gang gis sred pa
329a8(mdo sde): bskams nas kyang / /de dag 'khor bar mi gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /zhe sdang khro bas skye dgu brlams/ /sems
329b1(mdo sde): kyang g.yeng 'gyur de yis na/ /dge ba thams cad mi 'tshal zhing / /bzod rlag las la spyod par bgyid/ /mi dge ba la gnas bgyid pa/ /pha ma dag la rim gro chung / /gang dag mtshams ma mchis bgyis pa/ /
329b2(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum la brnyas par bgyid/ /snying brtse snying rje ma mchis pa/ /'jigs bgyid gtum po drag shul can/ /khro sems dbang gis de dag ni/ /sems dmyal mnar ma mchis par gnas/ /sems
329b3(mdo sde): can 'di dag khro ba'i rgyus/ /gcig la gcig ni za bar bgyid/ /yang dang yang ni ngan song du/ /sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir/ /sdig pa'i sems kyis brid gyur cing / /dge ba'i bshes gnyen spangs
329b4(mdo sde): nas kyang / /srid pa'i mtshor ni ltung ba ste/ /mun pa mun gnag gzhol ba po/ /de 'dra'i sems can don slad du/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba'i/ /bsam pas bdag bde btang nas kyang / /sems can
329b5(mdo sde): sdig pa bsal slad du/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na/ /bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos sum gyis/ /sdig pa'i sems can grol bgyid cing / /chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bgyid/ /sems can 'ga'i don
329b6(mdo sde): slad du/ /lus dang srog dag btang nas kyang / /dka' thub brtul zhugs spyad ldan pa/ /dka' ba dag ni mang du spyad/ /gang tshe sems can 'ga' slad du/ /bskal brgyar sdug
329b7(mdo sde): bsngal sel bgyid na/ /sems can rnams slad yun ring du/ /'khor bar sdug bsngal bzod par bgyi/ /sems can yongs su smin slad gnas/ /de 'dra'i bsam dang ldan pa yis/ /
329b8(mdo sde): sems can srid pa'i bsam pa can/ /sems ni byang chub mngon bgyid stsal/ /de nas dpal lha mo chen mos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
330a1(mdo sde): phyug la bre bo lo tog gis bkang ba de phul nas smras pa/ gling bzhi pa 'di'i sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa dag gi rgyur sa
330a2(mdo sde): bon dang / lo tog thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / grub par bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu dam pa khyod la lhung bzed dbul lo/ /des na dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par chad
330a3(mdo sde): pa/ ma rungs pa/ gtum po/ drag shul can kun du sdug bsngal thams cad las bsgral ba dang / byang chub kyi sa bon la bzhag par rngo thog go/ /de nas
330a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bre bo lo tog gis bkang ba de blangs nas phyogs bcur bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/ /
330a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dgongs su gsol/ gang gis gling bzhi pa 'dir sa bon
330a6(mdo sde): dang / myu gu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dang / sa'i bcud dang / gzi byin dang / sems
330a7(mdo sde): can gyi gzi byin dang / dam pa'i chos kyi ro dang / snying ku dang / gzi byin dag mi nyams shing 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma dang /
330a8(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad par bgyid pa dang / gang gi de longs spyod pa dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis sems can rnams yongs su
330b1(mdo sde): smin par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa las zlog par bgyid pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la dgod par rngo thog pa dang / gang gis 'dir sems can de dag thams cad
330b2(mdo sde): kyis ngan song rnams yongs su spangs nas mtho ris la gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis dpal lha mo chen mo de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar
330b3(mdo sde): phyogs bcu na gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus par bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa thams cad 'dir dgongs su gsol/ tad+ya thA/ mu ni shi ba/
330b4(mdo sde): mu ni na tre/ mu ni pa la/ mu ni sa le/ san ta u sa k+Shi ti/ k+Sha nu pra Na nI la ba ya sarba bi dza ba stil li swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan
330b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis legs so/ /zhes bya ba gnang nas dpal lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dpal cho ga shes khyod kyis gling bzhi pa 'dir sa bon
330b6(mdo sde): dang / myu gu dang / lo tog 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khyod ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor tshogs pa dang bcas pa
330b7(mdo sde): ma lus pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin kau shi kas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
330b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
331a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya'o/ /ri'i snying pos zhus pa zhes bya'o/ /gzungs kyi za ma tog ces bya'o/ /
331a2(mdo sde): sa'i bcud 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor sems can yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
331a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/ dpal lha mo chen mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i snying po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams
331a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo sde las de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpal gyi
331a5(mdo sde): dam tshig ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / // // rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarba dz+nyA de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban
331a6(mdo sde): de dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa/ /ye d+hArmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba drata/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e ba~M bA dI ma hA shra maNaH//
